The tapas here are extremely small, so to feel satisfied, you‚Äôll likely end up spending more than ‚Ç¨10 per person. We tried all five burgers, the sharing board, and a chicken salad. The burgers were tiny and not very good, the salad was just okay, but the board was simple yet quite nice ‚Äî probably the only thing I‚Äôd order again. We also had hot tea and Somersby cider to go with our meal.

Update: I was on a SATURDAY and turns out it matters a lot when it comes to prices.

We visited this restaurant to have a cup of hot coffee. Their menu consist of many food items at very affordable rates. The restaurant seems very old and give a nostalgic feeling when you dine in. Restaurant staff is friendly. No table service is available. Pay and dine self service is practiced. Great place to have a quick bite. We visited this place twice on the same day just to have a quick bite. Highly recommend!

Very bad experience. I didn‚Äôt know the restaurant so I sat on the terrace for a quick meal. I waited for 20 minutes and no one came to serve or ask what I wanted. So I grabbed all my stuff and went inside and the process of ordering and paying is exhaustive. Besides, the employees didn‚Äôt know what a burgu√™s without any bread or sauces is. You can see by the picture attached the size of my meal. So, what people are eating is that 2 centimeters kind of meat‚Ä¶ and the rest is unhealthy stuff. Like bread and tuns of sauces. Besides that that have empty food like lots of French fries, god knows for how long they keep that out where they fried them burning!!!! I hated it! They are fooling the kids and the students who they saw as an opportunity as this ‚Äúrestaurant‚Äù is we can even call it that is in AVEIRO. A nice Portuguese university city. Please don‚Äôt go there! It‚Äôs terribly unhealthy and they are selling empty junk food.

I'm not sure the locals have fully embraced 100 montaditos, I do not know why, it is like the iberian equivalent to Spoons. A pint is 2 euros and the tapas just over a euro each, they are tasty and good. No table service, just collect your food when your pager goes off. The outside of the building has nice tiling, the inside lots of photos. Recommended.

Regular 100 Montaditos place with various options.
I expected something more, because i didn't know this franchise before.
Since it's a fast food chain, it's really nice and kind of good - but nothing extraordinary.
On the other hand - their Sangr√≠a is the best one I've ever tried!

We had a great meal at Camada. The francesinha was absolutely great. For dessert, the chocolate mousse was delicious. But the best part was that the staff were all very friendly and polite. A wonderful experience from start to finish

The BEST burger in town!!! Made perfectly. I ordered the Cheddar one and forgot to take a pic, but here is the last bite üòÇ

The Francesinha was also well done! We def recomment this place!

For those who like to try different things‚Ä¶here you have it! Try a different recipe of Francesinha Sauce. Highly recommended.
If you are looking for ‚ÄúOriginal Sauce‚Äù - Wrong place!
It‚Äôs a casual place to go with good prices expect for drinks.
Ps. This is the ‚ÄúHalf‚Äù Francesinha.

To me, so far, the BEST Francesinha in Aveiro. Incredible meat quality, presentation, the rustic fries were perfectly seasoned and cooked and the sauce was just heavenly.
Very relaxed atmosphere with plenty of customers casually talking.
The staff that tended to our table of 7!! people, was extremely nice, effective and fast. In around 10 minutes, our order had been completed and brought out to our table. An absolutely overwhelming (in the best possible way) experience, and not expensive at all. Highly recommendable, I myself will also revisit whenever possible.

Second time visiting: just as incredible as the first. I felt catered just perfectly. This time choosing an alcoholic beverage, it was served in a glass of the exact same brand as the drink and some ice. Couldn't've asked for anything better.

Really asthenic place with a pleasent sitting area. Good place for a fast meal but comfortable enough to spend some time there. The food was great and I just wish that Francesinha would be served with French Fries included, without being a add-on, it should be more expensive and include the French Fries, nobody eats francesinha without French fries. For those who like traditional Francesinha be aware that the only resemblance to a typical francesinha is the sandwich, the sauce is really far from the traditional typical Francesinha sauce, it seems to be a cheddar and tomato based sauce making it a bit sweet. But nevertheless it was a great Francesinha and I really enjoyed the different spin on the sauce, it makes it interesting and it was tasty, the sandwich was really good and the ingredients used all tasted high quality.
Other than that the staff was amazing, really nice and pleasent, the menus include a drink and coffe which is really nice for the prices they have. The coffee is from Lavanza and it was tasty and well extracted.
I really enjoyed my time there.

Unfortunately today's experience was very poor....
We consider ourselves as regular customers of this restaurant. Today we came there and asked for slices of pizza. We chose a vegetarian one which they had to make. Then they brought it saying that now it looks different... (they couldn't say it before), it isn't the same one as on the menu, it is economic version with only 2 ingredients which they make when someone ask ONLY for slices.
When I looked properly there were some roughly cut tomatoes and bunch of onion...Pizza de Cebolada üòâ.
After first bite I got very disappointed. Absolutely tasteless thing, just some strange low-cost product which wasn't edible.

This is very shameful, it had never happened to us. Always they made a big size pizza, cut slices and sold the rest. My day wasn't perfect today and I was quite hungry and I received such disappointment.

Fortunately there are many other options to go to eat in Aveiro so I will try one of them next time üôÇ.
Mr Pizza in Aveiro was one of our favourite restaurants but after this...Good Luck üçÄ.

Be careful what you order!
Decent pizza, however the workers don't speak english and they tried to scam us and changed the price when we wanted to pay. Wouldn't recommend if you're a foreigner.

Size and flavor was good for the price. But the amount of toppings was ridiculously skimpy. On the largest size pizza that included olives and chorizo sausage as toppings, there were about a dozen olives and a dozen sausage slices with vast amounts of cheesy space left with nothing... but cheese. Nice big New York-sized slices, but you had to take several bites of just cheese for each bite that included any toppings. In fact, the two main toppings were so few and far between, it was impossible to get an olive and a sausage in the same bite. The staff was friendly. I am, however, unlikely to return to this pizzeria.

Worst service ever! Received a pizza missing one slice, and didn‚Äôt find out till I ate 2 slices! Looks like the pizza was arranged by the Uber delivery guy after he ate it in a way that it looks like a full pie! But then I saw the cut marks on the bottom of the box and counted 8 slices and my pizza had only 7! Disgusting! Reported to them they could not care less!!! No Uber Eats or the restaurant tried to help me so I guess from now on we will have to count the pizza slices at the delivery otherwise you are not covered! Will never order here again or use Uber Eats! The name of the delivery guy is Lijo.

The music doesn't help to eat in the restaurant. we sat in the front and unfortunately the speakers were in the ceiling,right where we were. The pizza came very cold and the veggi pizza only had a couple of ingredients. In the menu on the wall the pizza comes with more ingredients. I was disappointed. the service was acceptable.

Last night I went to Rang Mahal with my boyfriend. We ordered the typical Indian bread, Naan, both the butter and garlic varieties, chicken soup, spiced rice, karahi chicken, and our usual drinks, iced teas. Our waiter was very attentive, always very polite, and regularly informed us when our food would be ready. We didn't know the chef, but the food was phenomenal! Very hot, you could tell it had just been made. The sauces, both for the naan and the chicken, were very tasty, and the restaurant was clean and organized! The bathrooms were also in very good condition. Overall, the food, the service, and the establishment were great! I highly recommend going to this restaurant. Enjoy the flavors of India that you will experience!

The restaurant has potential, but my experience wasn‚Äôt great. The food was too mild for medium hot ordered and could use more seasoning of real garlic for garlic naan. The owner seemed a bit inattentive, which affected the overall experience. I hope they take customer feedback seriously and improve.

Absolutely loved my dining experience at Rang Mahal Restaurant! The mix of Indian and Italian dishes makes this place truly special. The Lasagne Al Forno was baked to perfection‚Äîrich, creamy, and full of flavor. On the Indian side, the food was outstanding. The Tandoori Chicken was juicy, tender, and packed with that authentic smoky flavor, while the other Indian dishes were full of spices that tasted just like home-cooked meals.
The staff was friendly and attentive, and the cozy atmosphere made it even better. Rang Mahal is the perfect spot if you‚Äôre looking to enjoy both authentic Indian food and delicious Italian classics under one roof. Highly recommended!üòçüòçüòç

üëéüëéOrder chicken biryani, but it not look biryani , it look some smelly curry mix with boiled rice . cheese naan have no cheese , just have simple naan/bread. very bad experience. totally waste of money. üëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëé

Rang Mahal Aveiro is hands down one of the best spots for authentic Indian food! The Cheese and Garlic Naan were soft, fresh, and full of flavor‚Äîabsolutely perfect to pair with the mains. The Karahi Chicken was rich, spicy, and cooked to perfection, while the Chicken Mango had a delicious balance of sweetness and savory spices that made it unforgettable.
The staff were welcoming and attentive, and the atmosphere was cozy and inviting. If you‚Äôre in Aveiro and craving real Indian food, Rang Mahal is the place to be. Highly recommended!
The Best Bubble Tea in Aveiro, possibly even in Portugal! Great, nice, young people that work there and very delicious bubble tea. I can highly recomend you this amazing place!
The avocado toast was sensational! I could not stop eating the half, before taking a photo üôà
Matcha Bubble tea tasted nothing like matcha, and taro tasted like cookie? :(. Too much sugar for a bubble tea aswell‚Ä¶
Inflated ranking IMO. Place looks good and the staff is friendly but the bubble tea experience for milk tea is worse than in other places.
Super nice staff and some of the tastiest bubble tea!

Coming from the US, I had to try a bacon cheeseburger and fries. Wow it was so good. Fries came hot and crispy with that dipping sauce like Raising Canes. Hamburger was flavorful and had ketchup and mayonnaise on it, I believe. I ate it too fast to check. The bun was so soft and fresh. Bacon was a generous thick slice not crispy but cooked just right. I washed it all down with a Coke zero.

The place is very easy to miss from the outside. The name is written in italics. But it's really worth it. There is a lot of tables there, but the place tends to get full. The burgers (main dish) don't look like much, but they are really tasty. Basically, you can either build your own burger, order from the menu or add ingredients as you wish. It tasted good. The fries are also quite good (just the right amount of crunchiness). Overall a good experience and it's also not very expensive. Basic burger is around 4 EUR. This makes it not only tasty but also good for a budget lunch. And the toilets are clean. Recommend visiting.

A solid 4/5. The food is really cheap so with that in mind it was really good and the portion size was big. I ordered a Ramona which was tasteful with many fillings but the only thing I did not really like was the bread, but again the price is cheap so that is fine.

Excellent and very affordable Food, the Sandwiches are among the best i ever had, the staff is very kind and attentive, they all speak English as well, i have been there twice and hope i will come back a lot more, thanks a lot!!

Localized burgers that are quite juicy, however wasn't a fan of having minced pork meat due to the bland flavours. But the service was great and the place itself was very modern and had good amenities. Considering the price of 3-4‚Ç¨ still worth a go.

Absolute perfection. Sushi served with an amazing traditional taste. Perfect execution. Quote.  Other places would charge triple for this quality. This place is a must if you are around Aveiro‚Ä¶ small, quiet and easy listening music classics. I was lucky enough to be the only person in the restaurant because of the early hours. I‚Äôll come back for sure!! True hidden jewel.

Stopped by for lunch and ordered their bento Izakaya with coke. I was excited to dine here, but left feeling disappointed. Bento Izakaya was priced at ‚Ç¨14.50 - and it comes with miso soup + a bowl of rice with 2 skewers of meat. The meat was a bit and can use more seasoning.
If you order Ala carte, 2 skewers of meat is ‚Ç¨5.50 and miso soup is ‚Ç¨3.80. The total is ‚Ç¨9.30 - and the rice is not a lot. Unless they serve magical rice that cost over ‚Ç¨5 per serving, I don‚Äôt understand why they charged ‚Ç¨14.50 for those. I feel cheated.
Very good ramen, excelent sushi and very good shrimp and almond tempura

Coming from the Pacific Northwest of the US, this is the closest we have found to PNW quality Japanese food. The chirashi bowl was fresh abs delicious, the ebi tempura crispy and tasty, and they have okonomiyaki!
Amazing food, amazing staff. One of the best Japanese restaurants I've ever been to, classic and unique dishes and friendly staff!

place_name: Onda Verde Restaurante - Prato do dia
review_text: Would definitely recommend this place to have a cheap meal. Lunch menu includes soup, main dish(meat or fish) and coffee, it costs 7.50‚Ç¨ if one chooses meat option and 8‚Ç¨ if it's fish. There is a good variety of options and they're all simple and traditional. As drinks are not included in the price, a finish price will be around 10‚Ç¨. Service was fine, the lady who served us was quite friendly. The main downside is how this restaurant is arranged, because it really looks and feels like a cheap ordinary cafe and the bathroom definitely needs renovation.

place_name: Onda Verde Restaurante - Prato do dia
review_text: This is a treasure for budget travelers in the over-touristy town of Aveiro! The restaurant was full of locals during the lunch time. The "menu do dia" includes soup, main dish and a coffee. It costs 7.5‚Ç¨ if you prefer meat, and 8‚Ç¨ for fish. The bread is not included, neither are the drinks and desert. Vinho da casa costs 3‚Ç¨ for half a liter. They offer simple Portuguese dishes which are tasty and big. On the pictures: Vegetable soup, Robalo with vegetables, Prego no prato (beef).

place_name: Onda Verde Restaurante - Prato do dia
review_text: A wonderful lunch in a perfect relaxing location. The kindness of people was exceptional. Will be back!

place_name: Onda Verde Restaurante - Prato do dia
review_text: Down home Portuguese-Brazilian cooking. Great food, prices, service and drinks. Simple, hearty fare and small family business - you can't go wrong here.

place_name: Onda Verde Restaurante - Prato do dia
review_text: Good, cheap, simple food. Stewed vitella with spaghetti was amazing. Service is typical of family restaurants so don't come if it's packed and you want a quick bite

Great Italian restaurant.
Everything was excellent and delicious. We ordered garlic bread with cheese which was thin, xrispy and very flavorful. Also ordered ravioli, funghi pizza, 4 cheeses penne and a steak. Everything was delicious.
Would definately recommend this restaurant.

Excellent garlic bread with thin, crispy dough.

Four cheese penne, rich in cheese worth adding mushrooms to the dish.

The Sangria based drink with red wine and cherries refreshing and tasty.

We were visiting Aveiro with friends and booked the restaurant for lunch. We reached little early but were accommodated. Not only this we were provided with a good location table. The staff is very helpful and friendly. For comfort of our friends they spoke English. The service was excellent and food was served hot. We had ordered two pizza, a pasta and a salad. Food is tasty and garlic bread was super delicious. Reasonably priced.

We had a delicious lunch there, with wine, passion fruit sangria and great steaks. They made a special steak for us with hot pepper to please some guests. I had the Chef steak which was perfect, tender and juicy as a good steak should be.
The sides were also very good, specially the french fries, which were perfectly crispy on the outside.
For dessert we had the homemade chocolate mousse and also the zabaione cream. They were both rich and nice, but the later was so delicate and tasty, that was simply delicious!
We look forward coming back there to try the rest of the menu!

I recently went to La Mamaroma for my birthday with a group of friends. We were all very happy with the food and service. The garlic bread was a great starter, and the Torino pizza was delicious. The service was friendly and the food arrived quickly. We would definitely recommend La Mamaroma to anyone looking for a great Italian restaurant in Aveiro.

This place is an absolute must in Aveiro! The food is beyond delicious, fresh and full of flavor, but what truly makes it unforgettable are the people. The warmest, kindest and most welcoming team you could ever meet ‚Äî they make you feel at home from the very first moment. A rare gem where both the food and the atmosphere are simply perfect. Highly recommended!

We had absolute blast in this small but very cosy restaurant. Staff was really friendly, spoke English very well, menu was also in English. The cod was cooked to perfection, good wine selection. Prices are very fair and I would be definitely back, when I'm in Aveiro!

Absolutely fantastic new place! This is my new favorite restaurant in Aveiro. Presentation, service, flavors, all are superb. With the small menu, chef Joao perfected his dishes. This is a must stop when visiting Aveiro.

The chef was really kind, he explained the food and the suggestions, we tried the bacalhau and the octopus the local way, we were impressed by the quality of the food.
I recommend this restaurant with all my might.
one of the best restaurant i tried.

Well, what can I say, exactly how I wish all restaurants I go to would be - elegant, personal chef dedicated service and food serving, amazing food, short but wonderful list of wines, I wish I would live nearby üòÇ

The food was great and the staff was very nice. The place is cozy, comfortable and had beautiful decoration.
Francesinha was very tasty and the sauce was really good.
Really affordable prices.
It's located in a beautiful area surrounded by the ria and very accessible. I'll come back for sure!
Thanks üëç

Excellent place to spend a couple hours with friends.
The food was excellent and the prices were very afordable, I recommend the green apple sangria!
The waitress was really friendly and quick with her service.
Recommend to anyone looking for a place to get something good to eat and to relax for a few hours.

Tasted like old food warmed up in the microwave. The "tomato sauce" was piri piri mixed with water :)
Everything was certainly processed & ready-made, which anyone can do at home instead of overpaying for food that tastes like cardboard.

If you want to find a real taste of Portugal, you should visit Adega 28!
Very good quality of ingredients, authentic food, traditional dishes.
You can feel passion for cooking and for ppl. I ve tried francesinha (11/10, your sauce is amazing), caldo verde... and i want more:) Its the place where you want to go back to!
I love this place, so charming and relaxing. I was very surprised eating that fries with egg , who would ever know :D and beer, especially beer, 10/10 would reccomend

Concise and to the point
We were just passing through and needed a cheap place to stay for one night. Expecting a hotel, we were surprised to find out it was a youth hostel upon arrival. This is just an observation, not a negative judgment.

The rooms were very basic, and the windows only tilted open, which was unpleasant in the summer heat. The showers were particularly unhygienic: the water didn't drain, they were dirty, and they smelled bad. Aside from that, the rest of the accommodation was clean. Unfortunately, some of the other guests didn't always respect the quiet hours, which was a bit bothersome.

We found it unusual that we were supposed to leave our room keys in a basket at the reception whenever we left the building. After a short discussion where we pointed out the security risk‚Äîthat someone could simply grab a random key and enter a stranger‚Äôs room‚Äîwe were allowed to keep our key.

The breakfast was tasty and there was a good variety.

The price of ‚Ç¨39 for two people was very cheap. For this price, you can't expect luxury, but the accommodation was perfectly fine for one night.

Aveiro is a beautiful town and well worth a visit. I stayed in hi Aveiro - pousada de Juventude which is about a ten minute walk from the town centre. The customer service I received from Margarida, who went out of her way to help me with directions etc, and the team was impeccable. The room was clean and the breakfast more than ample.
J B from Scotland
Orginal 1star hostel! The bed like my 100 year Grandfather teeth

I've only stayed one night here in a 6 bed dorm. When checking in the lady was not too sure if my bed was already used but gave it to me anyway. There is only one key per room and this has to be dropped of at the receiption everytime you leave the room. Otherwise over night the room is always open over night and everyone could get in whilst you sleep. No air conditioning, so it was really warm in the room. Bathrooms could be cleaner too, but all in all for one night and for the price it was doable.

Stayed here 2 nights, September 2023. After a year travelling, this hostel was the dirtiest one I've ever stayed in. Mould in the corners of the common room, water on the floors in the hostel.
My dorm room was a 6 bed. Two electrical plugs in the room, both behind bunks. To use them you had to pull the bunk away from the wall 2 inches. This made the passageway impassible.
One plug in the common room.
No air con, so windows only, but on the ground floor, in an open field.
Breakfast was ok. Front desk staff ok.
Recommendation: stay elsewhere.
You can walk on it or ride a bike, as it has both - the stairs and the ramp. Nice views from the top, plenty of space up there to ride a few loops

Built in 2011, this is an elevated pedestrian walkway that connects Parque da Baixa de Santo Ant√≥nio and Parque Infante Dom Pedro. It was designed to enhance pedestrian flow while keeping foot traffic separate from vehicles. This slender, aesthetically pleasing structure is made of metal and wood, with graceful curves that harmonize with the surrounding greenery. While the walkway may sway slightly when crossed‚Äîadding a bit of thrill‚Äîit is structurally sound and secure. Its design aims to offer not only functionality but also a pleasant, scenic walking experience above the park landscape.
Very original üëçüèºüö≤üö∂üèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è
Cool
It‚Äôs a great bridge. It not only has a sense of design, but also blends into the park environment and takes into account safety. It‚Äôs a great bridge.
Fresh and well served food. The staff was very nice and always helpful. Everything was fast and good quality.
Excellent atmosphere, good food, the Espumante Sangria was fab!

Incredible experience. The dishes were really nice and the service was perfect.
I personally recommend the "Natas do ceu", the best I've tasted in Aveiro!
Great choice, excellent food, fast service. And the best "natas do c√©u" worldwide. Really.

Wonderfull.
Kiwi juice, raspberry juice, grilled Chicken, grilled Porc and a coffee for 23 Eur.
And they tasted great.
A beautiful town with houses decorated with tiles. There are canals lined with boats.
Very nice place to walk with the family.

The let us wait for 15 minutes before even taking our order. Then they gave half our order to another table so only half of us could eat. The salads were very uninspired and didn't taste like much. Avoid.
Lovely place to just sit in the sun and watch the boats go by with a beer or a coffee. Very friendly staff.
We enjoy coming here to have drinks and enjoy the beautiful weather next to the canal.also very dog friendly.
Clean, good view of the water, good food, good service at a great price.  It is worth eating lunch there and enjoying the view.
Fabulous location to enjoy a coffee or meal. Given the location the prices are reasonable. We found the service to be friendly and efficient.
I booked a meeting room at Fusion Cowork yesterday and had a great experience. The space is fantastic and the staff were super friendly and welcoming
Cozy and welcoming place. Quite zone, had a very productive and focuseed time there.

Very nice office, warm welcoming. :) We were here just for one day but got everything we needed: screen, extra meeting room, kitchen, etc.
Would definitely recommend!

Fusion Cowork in Aveiro is a fantastic coworking space that provides an excellent environment for people to work collaboratively and efficiently. As someone who has worked there through my company, I can attest to the professionalism and friendliness of the staff and other professionals in the space.

The coworking space is spacious, well-lit, and thoughtfully designed, which creates a comfortable and inspiring atmosphere. The high-speed internet connection is reliable, ensuring that I can work seamlessly without any interruptions. Additionally, the meeting rooms are well-equipped with all the necessary amenities, which are perfect for meetings, brainstorming sessions, and presentations.

The best part about Fusion Cowork is the community of professionals who work there. They are a friendly and diverse group of individuals who are always willing to collaborate, share ideas and network. The social events organized by the space also provide a great opportunity to meet new people and create lasting connections.

Overall, I would highly recommend Fusion Cowork to anyone looking for a professional and welcoming coworking space in Aveiro. It is an excellent place to work, network, and grow your business.
Excellent coworking space. The people are very kind and the place is relaxed. I had a full day of meetings online and the internet never failed. Happy to come back again!

Odd and terrible service. I asked for a certification of my signature for car customs clearance, but since I‚Äôm not good in Portuguese they asked me to come with translator so he would translate the document to me in my language. They were rude and unpleasant. I decided to go to another lawyer and everything worked smooth without any translators. Do not recommend
Visited Aveiro on Saturday 2 weeks ago, so relaxing to walk n ride along the fountain n the canal.

A lovely spot in Aveiro if you're a culture lover.
A beautiful pond with a dock around it.
You can sit here and relax.
The fish swim freely right in front of your feet, and it's teeming with them.
This is in front of the former ceramic factory, if I'm not mistaken.

Great dinner with wife! The atmosphere is nice, and the waitress was very kind to us. The food was fantastic. For appetizers, we ordered delicious Octopus Takoyaki. Then, I ordered Pork Ramen, and it was well cooked, great portion and a little spicy as I like. As for dessert, I ordered pumpkin brownie, which was great. However, I think the desserts are a bit overpriced.

A quite disappointing experience, here is why:
- We arrive at the table, there is one missing chopstick support and two white hairs in the place math where the same chopsticks were in direct contact (it begs to question why they don't provide the chopsticks inside of a paper wrapper or something similar).
- Due to the disposition of the tables, it is possible to observe what happens behind the counter and, unfortunately, we saw an employee sneeze right into their hands and then, a few moments later, put nori seaweed directly with his hands inside the ramen bowl.

Although this is enough for a sanitary nightmare, in terms of ramen, the flavour is nothing out of the ordinary (had way better ones in Porto or even at home) and it is not worth the 15‚Ç¨.

The ambience of the restaurant is cozy and you do not wait long to take the order nor to receive the food.

I was pretty excited to try out the ramen, since it's one of my favourite dishes in life, but I am afraid I will not be coming back, at least not until the staff is properly trained in terms of sanitary etiquette.

Amazing Ramen and noodles with a nice atmosphere (you can even eat at the counter like a true ramen shop). We had the pork Baos and the Shoyu Pork Ramen. They were delicious!
If you like matcha, there are many options too, from tea to deserts!
Everything was SO good and their special Korean menu was also very on point! The only place you can find Korean food in Aveiro currently. Will definitely be back! Kimchi jigae w/ dduk üëç
Everything was amazing!  Good service! Very good price. Very cosy and delicious. Very clean and nice place. Nice personal.

place_name: Esquina Viva - Fabrico de Molduras & Galeria de Arte
review_text: The best place! Very professional and reliable. Totally recommend.

place_name: Esquina Viva - Fabrico de Molduras & Galeria de Arte
review_text: Very best friendly service by owner and perfect frame work.

place_name: Esquina Viva - Fabrico de Molduras & Galeria de Arte
review_text: Great store with a lot of options and suggestions to frame an image

Category: Fashion
Prices: 3B (Good, Pretty, and Cheap)
Service: Excellent
Sourcing: Varied

Small shop with a big heart and selection...!
Diverse clothing and jewelry... Jewelry with its own collection, which also makes custom-made items and repairs.

Recommendation: Go in and look at everything in detail. There are clothes for all tastes and to create interesting combinations.

I recently had the pleasure of purchasing furniture from Antarte, and I couldn't be happier with my experience. I was in contact with Joana Baptista who helped me organize the delivery of my Tv stand from Portugal to Monaco. The production and delivery time were respected. She made the entire experience seamless and stress-free.
Thank you, Antarte, and especially Joana, for a great experience! I look forward to staying in touch for future orders!
Adriana was wonderful to work with and very helpful, kind, and professional . I bought a beautiful sofa just the right size for my apartment with her help. Very beautiful store. I highly recommend!

6 out of 5 stars
Super super happy with product and service. Thank you!!
Lovely place with beautiful furnitures and great service
Top

Quick and excellent service fair on the budget side.
Excellent treatment, communication and suggestions for electronic equipment upgrades.

PC Galaxy is a great place for everyone having trouble with their systems. Technitians are proffesional and they know what they are doing.

I definitely recommend their service.
Excelent service! Professional and kind people working there!

We were fortunate to have Alexandre De Almeida assist us with our real estate project in Portugal, and we highly recommend him! His professionalism, in-depth knowledge of the market, and valuable advice helped us better understand real estate in Portugal and make the right choices with complete confidence. Always attentive and available, he guided us with professionalism and transparency. Thank you again for this wonderful experience!

A big thank you to Alexandre Almeida!
A trustworthy person who speaks both Portuguese and French.
The comfort of having someone you can trust.
I highly recommend him.
A big thank you to Alexandre Almeida who was very professional and very attentive to our needs, he is the best, I recommend him with my eyes closed, don't hesitate!!

One of my favourite pubs in Aveiro. Good atmosphere, very friendly owner, well priced.

Parking could be better, but you should not drink and drive anyway
Nice owner and relaxed atmosphere. Food is basic burgers, hot dogs, wings, etc  but its more about a bar really with snooker, fun with friends, .. great place for fri, sat night

Amazing place. Friendly atmosphere, specially on Thursdays night with Dr Why game. One of the best after hours bars to spend time with friends.
After the first visit I will be back for more.
Delicious Burger, great atmosphere.

I was very impressed with this shop. They have a really wide range of styles and it is very large so easy to walk around and browse. Most sizes are available in boxes on the shop floor so you can try on shoes without having to wait. I found just what I wanted at a reasonable price so very happy. I will certainly look here again when I need more shoes!

I was quite disappointed that the only way to get someone to answer my question was to actually go to the store and ask. Because no one at any of the stores actually takes the time to answer the phone ü§î

A shoe store in downtown Aveiro. The service is terrible. The merchandise is constantly out of place. If you want to return shoes (new) bought yesterday, they won't refund your money ‚Äì this violates consumer protection laws. The product is new, but they require you to return it within six months and spend the same amount on something else, or something more expensive. This store's policy is extremely poor.

If you like to be treated very poorly by a very rude staff, feel free to go there !
Disrespectful to the least.
It's a shame we can't go into negative ratings really. This shop is terrible, don't lose your time going to this one.
Thank you so much Jorge Santos for your perfect client service and fast support!
Very nice people and helpful. Thanks for everything.üòâ
Quality sports shoe store, but quite expensive! Refined presentation.
Super good food and service everything was perfect thank you for the kindness

Ok, when you are looking for something cozy , romantic, chef cuisine etc. that‚Äôs definitely not your spot. BUT‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ if you are looking for this typical restaurant where locals only will appear , it‚Äôs loud , tasty and so much Portuguese, than you should not miss it.

The restaurant has a nice ambiance, but the chef is slow, very slow. We ordered a meal that took 1 hour and 30 minutes. It's absurd! The staff, when asked, doesn't even know what to say properly. It's a good restaurant, but it needs to improve its service. I only recommend it to those who have plenty of time and don't need to rush. For foreigners, workers, and students with tight schedules, I don't advise having lunch here because the food will take too long.

Was there for lunch. Out of everything that was on the daily menu. How? If you dont have something, you remove it from the menu and the server should highlight it immediately rather that 35 minutes AFTER ordering. Will never come here again.

Ended after having to choose three different times. Had the sea bass. It was ok. Nothing to write home about. I have had better. The side vegetable was a boiled potato and some cauliflour with carrot. Both seemed like they came from the frozen food isle. The bits were all uneven and gnarled like from the bottom of the bag. It was not appetizing to eat nor look at. Sorely disappointed. The food in Portugal is much better in places that are much less fancy.
Pork Rolls are amazing here. Good ambience, nice range of beers
The food is very delicious and also the staff is very friendly. My food came also soooo quickly. I am definitely coming back and I can recommend this place a lot!!
The coffee is very good and the food too. I spent an evening working there and they were super friendly. It is well decorated and cozy.

Just an amazing little coffee house, and a must visit if you ask my wife an I. Hands down the best coffee in Aveiro, and their desserts were amazing. The staff was also great.

If you want boujee coffee, they have the best.

10/10 would go back.

Loved this little charming cafeteria. The cappuccino was perfect and the chocolate cookie was delicious. The staff was incredibly friendly and the price very reasonable. I am just sorry that I didn't have more days to go there for a coffee.

We decided to go to Mon Lou for brunch with some friends who frequent there every weekend more or less, the treatment we received from one of the female waitresses with the blonde hair was offensive and uncalled for.

We ordered a variety of tosta mistas, iced coffee and a waffle. The tosta mistas came less toasted than what our friends usually receive and from what we like as well, we politely asked if the waitress could toast them a little more, a reasonable request, we are not returning the food. The reaction of the waitress was to take the plates with an attitude, no apology or acknowledgment, as if we are inconveniencing and offending her.

Firstly, no one said the food was poor, purely that we prefer the sandwich when it is crunchy and golden, not chewy and white on the outside, like everyone. When the waitress returned with the tosta mistas now toasted to our preference, she drops them on the table with an attitude and asks if our friends enjoyed the waffle, they said "yes thank you it was very good", to my absolute disbelief the waitress responds with a very rude and brazen tone "pelo menos isso" (at least this).

My tosta mista with chicken mayo was average, you can see from the picture the amount of chicken they put is very little, they ratio of chicken to mayonnaise is also off so you have no taste of the chicken and the mayo makes it quite sickening. The cheese used was not of good quality and lacked taste, also it states that they put oregano, but they put so little and only on the outside that you cannot taste it, so it is pointless.

I can say the iced coffee was very good, not too sweet and I liked how they blended the ice with the coffee, similar to how Starbucks or cafes in the US do it.

However, I will not be returning to this establishment as I do not pay money in exchange for a waitress that is so miserable with her own life that she needs to be rude for free to people she doesn't even know. I advised the owner to have a word with the waitress, whether she does who knows, I won't be returning.

If you do not like to be treated like a second class citizen without education, then avoid this place, there are plenty other establishments in Aveiro who treat their customers with respect and at minimum, a smile.

A very nice place in Aveiro. The owner and the stuff is super nice and the food is amazing and really affordable! I come here with my friends almost everyday. They have a lot of vegan and gluten free options and a daily changing dish of the day (vegetarian and with meat or fish). You should also try one of there amazing cakes for dessert.

Wonderful food and a popular restaurant with the locals. Has a daily veg and non veg plate along with drinks and desert. Price is super reasonable, WiFi is good, and bathrooms are clean.  I ate three three days and it was consistently good

There are plenty of advantages that this place has: 1. Affordable prices. 2. The meal changes everyday. 3. Plenty of options for vegetarians, vegans etc. whatever food preference you have, you will have here! 4. The desserts are fantastic - I recommend the del√≠cia ‚ô•Ô∏è

Really really truly recommended! Tasty food ! Nice portions, really good deserts and all We have tried was Vegan üå±. The chef is an elderly woman and her energy and experience are felt all the way through the meal. Very clean place and friendly staff.

Not in the direct city center, but still in a reachable distance. This is a great option if you want to go healthy and at the same time you don't want to spend unnecessary much on healthy meals. The portions are big and meals are tasty in general.
Nothing is in English here, so train your Portuguese before entering this place. I wouldn't manage without my Portuguese speaking friend. The restaurant is super busy and it was a bit chaotic. I think that it needs a bit different order flow as the one that the place has now.

When you're walking on the street, passing by this bakery, you can smell the freshly baked breads. What an invitation to come inside and buy some bread ! The bread is tasty, with several different options, and not more expensive than the other bakeries. However for cakes and other delicacies I would rather go to other nearby pastry shops.
Love their breadüëçüèºüëçüèº
One of the best bakeries in Aveiro, very nice and tasty variation of quality food. Prices are quite adequate (not expensive at all).
Fabulous small bakery with tradition breads - but also some types not normally found. Well worth a visit.
The woman working was very kind and also a good selection!
This is a convenient store outlet from SPAR chain in Aveiro. Relatively smaller outlet in comparison to others.
Small grocery store, it is more like a convenience store. They have some wine and beer. They also have a meat and cheese section inside.
Overcrowded, just one employee in the store. No bags to shop for vegetables available.
Ideal for grocery shopping
Small but friendly space. Not the cheapest but it as "everything".

place_name: Paukar - Cafetaria, Sabores E Paladares, Lda.
review_text:
I was an Erasmus student in Aveiro and we ate there a lot. It's cheap and everything is delicious. It's a family bar. It's run by a very nice man with his wife in the kitchen.

100% recommended.
Very discreet, excellent for events and groups, good food!
Nice spacious house with history for university guests.
Very good place!
There are no ghosts
Wonderful experience

The place is run by amazing people.
The food is good and affordable.

Nice atmosphere.

Not a fancy place if that‚Äôs what you are looking for, but one of the best places for me
Really enjoyed the alheira, yummy. Due to miscommunication, had a chance to try alcohol free stout. 1/2D means a smaller portion good for one pax.

We had the lombinhos con am√™ijoas and the bacalhau √† Br√°s and both were delicious. The place is away from the crowds in a quiet street. The service was amazing, super attentive and fast. Well Priced. Would definitely come again. Muito obrigada

Got to love that 'bacalhau com natas' (codfish w/ milk cream). Still the best around. Very nice people in there. Home kitchen, that's it, feels like it. Today I was introduced to the 'cova'. Can't say more, it's kind of secret and not for everyone. üòú

Traditional Portuguese cafe and restaurant Well cooked and very tasty traditional food at a very reasonable price Very friendly staff These places are sadly slowly disappearing in a town overtaken by profit oriented franchises serving fakery at ridiculous prices Well kept secret n Aveiro!
The best lawyer in town! Thank you for winning this case Pedro!
Absolutely do not recommend!
I had a great time, very real.

If you plan to visit Aveiro, the Portuguese Venice, you can stay in this little house, a 1-minute walk from the canal. It's perfect, charming, and completely renovated. Excellent service from the owner.

We stayed for a whole weekend; we're a couple with two children. The house is exceptional, with everything you need, the location is central, and the owner was fantastic. I would recommend this place to anyone.

I first saw Rafael's Interview in Youtube Expats Everywhere Channel a year ago. We were looking to buy a property in Madeira last year which was a new construction project. We are US Citizens based in Chicago and love Madeira Island.

The interview impressed me and I reached out to Rafael and he setup an initial Zoom Call and explained the entire Mortgage Process to me, for US expats moving to Portugal and planning to buy property.

I submitted all the documents needed for Mortgage via a Shared Google Drive and Rafael and his team got working on it immediately. They helped me with finding a good Mixed Rate with multiple banks. They also helped me open a Bank Account at NovoBanco using a Lawyer, all done remotely.

We finally closed the Public Deed on time and I travelled to Madeira for the Deed and we got the Keys to the property in Feb 2024.

Rafael and his team (Frederico Franca) provided exceptional service and made the process totally smooth. They reached out to my builder to get all the documents needed for the Deed and liaised with the NovoBanco Bank Manager on my behalf to make sure everything gets done on time and there are no hiccups during the Public Deed Closing.

If you are planning to buy property in Portugal, please go with Rafael and his team for your Mortgage Needs. They are the most professional and the best team out there helping US and EU expats buy property in Portugal and get a Mortgage.

I give them 10/10 for their professional, communication, ethical and a very knowledgeable team. Highly recommended. Thanks Rafael and Fred for making the Home buying and Mortgage FInancing  process extremely smooth for me.

Purchasing our dream home felt like an impossible task until we met Rafael and his incredible team, Fred and Emilia. From start to finish, their expertise, dedication, and professionalism made all the difference. Rafael‚Äôs deep knowledge of the mortgage process and Fred‚Äôs invaluable guidance turned what seemed like an overwhelming journey into a smooth and achievable goal.

Emilia, our lawyer, demonstrated exceptional professionalism and skill, seamlessly navigating the legal complexities and ensuring everything was handled with precision.

Their communication was excellent throughout, keeping us informed at every step. Their genuine care and willingness to go above and beyond truly set them apart.

Thanks to Rafael and his team, we successfully purchased our dream home in a beautiful location, and we couldn‚Äôt be more grateful. Their advice and support made all the difference, and we will forever be thankful for their hard work and dedication. Our kids will grow up appreciating the wonderful environment and, most importantly, the warmth of a true family home. Thank you all from the bottom of our hearts.

If you‚Äôre considering buying property in Portugal, especially if you‚Äôre navigating a complex process like obtaining a mortgage or dealing with legal matters, we wholeheartedly recommend Rafael, Fred, and Emilia. They‚Äôre the team you can trust to make your dreams a reality!

The team assembled by Rafael was consciously aware of providing us with the best care, attention, and options needed to buy a new home. It was a very high level of professionalism that always made us feel at ease, removing anxiety or any concerns during the process. They took us each step of the way, making sure we understood the where and why for everything that was being done. They never gave us the impression of alarm or pressure, and were prompt in their responses to our questions. Very Highly Recommended.
Awesome experience during a hectic time moving. Extremely great service and seamless. Will continue to use in the future.

Working with Rafael and his team was amazing. They were extremely organized and communicated with us at every turn. Buying a house in a foreign country is very daunting and has plenty of twists and turns, but Id never do it again without Rafael and his team. Thank you all very much!

This review is based on several times that I came here. The service here is "all you can eat." Personally, I prefer this type of service because the food is prepared upon the order. The food is great, especially the spicy shrimp! The atmosphere is quite nice. However, the service this time was a bit slow, even though they were almost full. I made a reservation, which I recommend, at 13h, and we finished lunch almost at 14h30. This was in a weekday! Apart from that, it was always a great experience and the price is good.

Reservation recommended on the weekends. The kitchen closes at 14:30. Large menu and everything was prepared well.

We had to wait a little for our food because the place was full but it was worth the wait. I liked the variety and they don't sacrifice the quality. Everything tasted good.

One of the better sushi restaurants I visited.

Used to be good, but the service got progressively worse (i used to come here once a month) not every server is rude, but 2 of them are especially unpleasant, made me stop going as often. Then food as been worsening with time too, loss of quality in some cases, in other cases just plain lack of care. If you want to go eat at a place where you feel like you're a bother, and want to wait close to an hour for your food, this is the place!  The food was it's redeeming quality, but now even that is gone!

We had a great experience, sure we‚Äôll be back. Just make sure to have a reservation and don‚Äôt visit the place 1 hour before it‚Äôs closed, you won‚Äôt be able to order more if you are still hungry
You can find very different types of sushi and not only. All you can eat, but it's not a buffet type, you ask positions from menu, as many as you want. Super tasty and fresh
Excellent professional, good service, and pleasant atmosphere, impeccable work in my case I recommend the waxing üëç
Great area for a nice walk and lots of fresh air.
Cozy place, went there with my bf for some drinks . I also liked the Egyptian theme
A very nice place with amazing drinks and shots
Very nice decoration and atmosphere.

Great shisha bar owned by two sisters: one specializes in drinks and the other in shisha.
Cool ambiance and decoration.
They have natural charcoal if you ask for it. A excellent option for a good time and shisha at the end of the day.
Amazing place and service! Pay attention on working hours and if planned to smoke shisha it is better to leave a reservation.
Anna is an amazing manicure, every time I come to Portugal I do my nails with her. Her place is very clean, she‚Äôs very detailed and her work is amazing as I said.

The manicure lasts perfectly, the nails look well-groomed and beautiful for a long time.

In addition, the atmosphere during the procedures is always pleasant - you can relax, chat and just enjoy the process. I really appreciate her attention to detail and individual approach. I definitely recommend her to everyone who is looking for a master who you want to return to again and again!

This place is absolutely amazing and local. Stumbled upon this place as a tourist and the prices were cheap. ‚Ç¨1 for cappuccino (which is the best cappuccino I have ever tasted), ‚Ç¨1.40 for sausage roll and ‚Ç¨2.50 for steak on burger! Absolutely delicious!!!
Been here for toast and coffee several times and have been served quickly and with a smile.  Toast is thick and very good.
Without a lot of pastry ( maybe because the school haven't start) but  opens early on Sunday.

Delicious coffee with rice cake, attentive and friendly staff.
I highly recommend it.
The best cakes I've ever tried and still an incredible price.
Beautiful, small, and steeped in history. There are many chapels in Aveiro. They're good historical sites to visit. A few steps further behind it is a mini chapel of St. Anthony.
It is an amazing place with an even better cost / benefit. I love getting my nails done there, great atmosphere and everyone is always very nice! They also have the best cookie ever
Happy first anniversary girls!
This is our go to cafe when we are around the area. Absolutely love their coffee and food. The owners are lovely and speaking my language. Loving it.
Friendly staff, excellent pastry and breads.
Excellent breads and coffees and lovely owners.
Excellent profissional realy enjoy the experience just one word 5üåüü•∞

review_text: Its closed

Help quickly resolve issue with financas portal
very Help full
The best

Appreciate the experience working with REA Jo√£o Silva. He arranged all the appointments fast, always available for our requests and helpful to make our life easy in our cozy apartments. They also assist with utility contracts before entering the apartments. And don‚Äôt worry about your portuguese proficiency, they‚Äôll support you in English.
I rented a flat through Jo√£o, and the whole process was smooth and quick. Everything was handled professionally, and I‚Äôm very happy with the service. Highly recommend!

Great attentive and professional service.
The people at Newimo are very responsive and good at problem solving.
Highly recommended.
Jo√£o Silva represents the owner of the apartment we rent. He has been responsive and helpful when we have needed to deal with him.

Trustworthy people
Fast responding and have alot of experience in the field.
Highly recommended
Top!
Nice coworking with meeting rooms, fixed (and not) desks, kitchen zone. Friendly staff, easy to book (call or email)
Not reachable and no one on site. Even though the opening hours say otherwise.
Free coffe 10/10

I had the pleasure in having Jose Lopes at Espaco P helping me strengthen my lower back muscles something that as been an issue for me for over 35 years.
He was always professional,  listens to my issues and created some exercises to fit my needs and helped me manage my lower back pain.
Top

Running a small business always comes with unexpected challenges, but without a doubt, the best business decision i have made since relocating to Portugal has been to contract the services of NBIZ. Their team of experts has not only been patient and supportive, but their knowledge of Portuguese business law is beyond compare, and I have confidence that my financials will be taken care of every step of the way.

Whether my new business succeeds or fails is ultimately up to me, but with NBIZ I not only feel like I am working with the best talent available, but I have the absolute trust of working with family!

Make a great decision of your own and connect with NBIZ Consultores today!

Very professional, knowledgeable and responsive.  We had all our questions answered in detail plus many useful suggestions and advices. We will definitely work with Dr. Mario and Catarina again and we highly recommend them.
Being a new person in Portugal I made a lot of mistakes in my first IRS. But, thanks to the help of Dr Eloi Moita, I was able to completely correct the situation.

AMAZING!
the best team!
Excellent collaboration and unbeatable creativity. Although they don't have a very high international profile, they are real gems. Thank God we discovered them before they explode.

Terrible terrible experience. I cannot understand why would someone have a shop and hate people and be rude to them for free. If you do not want to receive Vinted packaged, do not make deals with them... People can be unhappy with life, but that does not give them the right to treat others badly
My advice is to stay as far from this store as possible. I only go there because I am forced to pick up parcels that are transferred by DPD.

I left a package to be returned and it disappeared. I went to the store to talk to them and they said they'd call me back with a possible solution, but nothing! In the end, I got neither a refund nor my package back.

place_name: Cl√≠nica de Dermatologia M√©dico-Cir√∫rgica Dr. Sereijo Silva
review_text:
This doctor needs to retire. He does not care about the mental well being of his patients and has zero bedside manner.  Bedside manner =  doctor's approach or attitude to a patient.   He doesn't receive the biopsy results but has you call to read them to him over the phone, except he didn't even allow me to read the complete result. When I asked questions to understand these results better,  he just continued to say don't worry about it and have nice holidays.   When I saw another dermatologist for a second  opinion , they said what Dr sereijo told me about my results was wrong.

There is a reason you can make an appointment a few days after calling the clinic, because he is a terrible doctor and professional.   Any other good dermatologist,  you need to wait several weeks or even months to be seen.  Avoid this guy at all costs. He is not up to date on current medical practices.

place_name: Cl√≠nica de Dermatologia M√©dico-Cir√∫rgica Dr. Sereijo Silva
review_text: Dr. Sereijo has been following me for more than 10 years, solving all the skin complications I had throughout that time. His knowledge and experience is invaluable, always with the right treatments and products. Thank you for everything. Hope I don‚Äôt need to visit but if I do I know I‚Äôll be in safe hands.

place_name: Cl√≠nica de Dermatologia M√©dico-Cir√∫rgica Dr. Sereijo Silva
review_text:
Very good medical appointments.
Both the doctor and the secretary always deal with matters in the best way.
Many congratulations for the good work.
Amazing results with this laser, at a good price.
Friendly and safe environment. Conveniently located.
Very good service.

The material are affordable and with quality. But what really stands out it's the quality of service. They have an excelent advice service, in which a client is invited to a Q&A period in order to properly identify the problem so that a material and a technique can be properly fitted. A mandatory stop for DIY lovers and those who find themselves in trouble and need solutions. And there is always a discount waiting for.

A very good display of the full @Robbialac line, but the most important thing is the advice from the salesperson. They provide you with extensive experience on what to buy based on what you want to do with the paint. 100% recommended.

I love this place.
Its a hidden Gem.
If you are reading this and your a tourist, you need to go here.
You want get more typical home made food than in someones home.
Actually its in their garage..
A must visit, Always busy.
Good food & service at very reasonable prices. Love the cozy interior. Recommend!
A very traditional Portuguese kitchen, good food made like at home. Restaurant is located in the inner garden of traditional Portuguese house.
Not a fancy place but the grilled fish and meat are very nice.
Best place in Aveiro!
What a little treasure!! Super helpful staff, Suzanna especially. Gorgeous quilting fabrics and such a selection for my project. Definitely coming back even if it is a 90 min drive from my house.
Lots of variety in fabrics and threads, the best qualities on the market! I also love the way they treat us every time we need something. Always very friendly, 10 out of 10 ü•∞

A bakery with a wide selection of products - you'll get Portuguese specials like pasteis, or brioche croissants but also red velvet or kinder bueno muffins, tortilla wraps, or milenesa sandwiches. Everything at fair prices. The service is quick and friendly.
Very tasty, fairly priced, nice atmosphere, great coffee and lovely people.
Very very good food and kind staff, very recommended
Wonderful bakery and coffee shop. The staff are super friendly as are the many students using the cafe. We had lots of offers for help in English also recommendations on what to choose. AMAZING.
The best padaria and caffee bar. The staff is very nice.
Good service and girls working there are very nice and professional.
Top

I got a sandwich with seafood paste, sweet corn, cherry tomatoes and lettuce. It was very very tasty and fresh. The soup was great too. You could taste the freshness of the ingredients in it, as well. The music was not that good though and the cool bright white light made the ambiance less warm. It would be great if warm white lights are used. Nevertheless, the place is super clean and the staff was welcoming and very very helpful. It was my first time and they let me try some of the pastes to decide.

I found rhis place on my random stroll throgh town, and was looking for somerhing fresh and healy. I asked for the servers favoriete sandwich and got a very tasty one. It was also a lot of food for me :).

We absolutely loved this gem of a restaurant; calm away from the tourists, the owner spoke English and was very attentive to our children. Excellent quality salads and juices. Highly recommend this restaurant!

Not entirely veggie, they have tuna seafood and chicken sauces.
You make your own salad or sandwich choosing the components.
Natural juices are also offered, you can get fresh fruits too.
Nice quality and price, but it is not a typical restaurant.
Great value menus with healthy food. Super nice people, recommended if you're looking for an alternative choice.

The interior is very modern and contemporary, good food, nice staff, great presentation, fresh fish, good drinks! The price is higher due to the atmosphere of the place, recommend do previously reservation it‚Äôs busy! And they don‚Äôt do solo dishes only rod√≠zio (all u can eat)

really big üëçüëç The service was good, the food came out quickly and the ingredients were fresh. They are very professional, each table has an iPad to order food, and you can choose to skip the ingredients you are allergic to. I love it and I will be back soon!
Everything was great: delicious sushi, quick service, fresh fish, very spacious and beautiful interior.
Excellent service! All the advantages of a buffet with friendly table service. Beautiful contemporary decoration.

It's a beautiful place to appreciate tasty food and creative. You'll eat with your eyes as well as with your mouth. Staff is friendly and efficient.
You order through a tablet device which eases the process. Each dish has an illustrative image, it mentions the quantity and has a description of ingredients.
The service is fast.
Hi Girls, you are such amazing people!! It was great being with you!! And I loved my hair&Make-up!!! Wish you all the best - beijos √© abracos Chris
Great people and professional
Super friendly staff. I had a an exclusive experience there :)

Great business with amazing people.
Thank you Synthia for the support in finding the right property.
Success for the whole Groupü•á

A true professional. Dialinda provided an invigorating 90 minute full body massage, immediately located key points if tension, and even surprised me with a very special facial and cranial massage. Wonderful, don't miss it.

Daylinda look after me with so much kindness and attention. She gave me the best massage ever. I was so stressed by daily life but this moment of pumper changed my day completely! Good pressure and very professional. Thank you Daylinda! You are the best! I ll come back soon
Wow, what a great massage. I didn‚Äôt know there were Hilot massages in Aveiro. I‚Äôll definitely go back.
Walked in stiff as a board, floated out like jelly‚Äîcoconut-oil magic! Cozy room inside Cris & Ro and totally worth the ‚Ç¨55
Great place for a quick bite. Nice people.
Great place for a peacefull cup of coffee.
Big feed, tasteful and affordable. Good experience. I paid less than $20 for 4 people.
Best kebabs ever!! Very good prices and great service.

Better than kebabs in the trade centers.
The cleaning could be better
Very bad food awful service

Very good and organised laundrette. There is a coin changing machine, two tables to fold your laundry, a book shelf, laundry baskets. Everything is very clean and organised.
The wash includes the soap. You don't have to bring detergents.
Oh, and there is also WiFi.

My only problem was that there was only explanation in Portuguese, but it's really my problem.
Notice that there are different machines for different weights, and the cost is different.
Super clean, fast and efficient! Laundry was dry in minutes! Thank you :)

Very helpful staff! And they have money changer if you don‚Äôt have coins!
Totally recommend!
This was my first experience in a place like this and it was amazing. The place is really welcoming and nice. And the smell is so good! For sure i will come back
Very nice, quiet and clean. There are one big (19 kg) and two small (9 kg) washing machines and three dryers (19 kg). Everything for your washing needs üòÉ

place_name: Atelier arranjos de costura " Dona Nataliia"
review_text: Perfect and quick service, good price. Thank you dear Nataliia!

place_name: The Redeemed Christian Church (RCCG) Living Water Parish Aveiro Portugal
review_text: It's a place to be where the love of Christ is being demonstrated. You won't regret the  fellowship

Great service, price and atmosphere. Amazing opportunity to be part of a local Portuguese (Aveiro) experience. Owners take good care of customers and the space.
Highly recommended!!

I am giving a very generous rating, as this place is open late and the prices are considerably reasonable for the area. This place has been here for many many years and clearly has not received an update. Overall the vibe is the same as when I was a 12 year old kid, this is a bar for children not adults. However, with these prices I have no interest in complaining.

I gave 5 stars because it's a great meeting place for students.

Internet and wall sockets to charge your phone. clean, good service and student prices.

But a student place might not be for you of course.
Great place for having some beer, coffee, tea, snacks, etc.

place_name: Atrouxa Lavandaria Self-Service Rua S. Sebasti√£o
review_text: For non Portuguese speaking people this place is perfect. The owner was very gracious and helpful. Place is very clean. Washer and dryer are good quality and well maintained

place_name: Atrouxa Lavandaria Self-Service Rua S. Sebasti√£o
review_text: Excellent, there's helpful staff. The system is easy to use and can be adapted to five languages. It's affordable, spacious, and clean. It has a coffee machine and Wi-Fi. There's a waiting area.

The customer service here is nothing short of perfect, all the workers are friendly and helpful. The support and prices for 3d prints are top quality. I've gone three times already. Amazing environment, defiantly would recommend going.
Very professional beautician and very reasonable prices.

I can't imagine giving this company a bad rating. 100% professionalism from the first meeting. They always accommodated our requests. If you are looking for real estate, you are at the right address. Highly recommended!

place_name: Espeto do Sul - Restaurante Rod√≠zio Brasileiro e Sushi Bar
review_text: Great lunch with co-workers! The atmosphere is nice, and the waiters were great with us. We went here to try the Brazilian Rod√≠zio, and so we ordered it. The meat was nicely cooked and tasty, as well as the side dishes. I ordered a chocolate mouse and it was fantastic! However, we found that the wines are a bit pricey, so we drank some beers.

place_name: Espeto do Sul - Restaurante Rod√≠zio Brasileiro e Sushi Bar
review_text:
Do not recommend sushi.
It‚Äôs incredible how they put mozzarella in sushi. Just not worth it. Skip the sushi part because it‚Äôs no good. Sashimi too thick, Soy sauce too salty. Crab stick within the rice ‚Ä¶. It‚Äôs just no good.
Meat was reasonable. Overall, if you want to eat some meat, it‚Äôs a decent place.

place_name: Espeto do Sul - Restaurante Rod√≠zio Brasileiro e Sushi Bar
review_text: This was a fantastic dinner. Amazing value for the 2 picanha set. The service was great, everyone was friendly and funny. The drinks were really yummy too. I recommend this spot for a great Brazilian dinner. Definitely go when you are hungry because there is a lot to eat!

place_name: Espeto do Sul - Restaurante Rod√≠zio Brasileiro e Sushi Bar
review_text: this was one of the best meals we‚Äôve ever eaten! we had a meat & sushi meal set and everything was 10/10. staff were very kind and helpful, spoke conversational English. they had an English menu too

place_name: Espeto do Sul - Restaurante Rod√≠zio Brasileiro e Sushi Bar
review_text:
A family that hunts with google and Trip Advisor for best places.

What an amazing find, truly exceptional food and experience. Recommend for everyone that loves food and to have a good time. Went with my sister snd her children so 4x adults and 6 children (from 2-15) and everyone loved the place. Will definitely come back again.

Excelent place to print all kind of works.
Great quality.
Excelent staff.

I needed a contact lens case and they gave me one as a gift. Thank you so much, especially to the young woman who helped me. I have wonderful memories of Aveiro. I recommend this shop to everyone‚Äîlocals, tourists, and foreigners like myself. Best regards, you are all so friendly and helpful. Have a great week!

Javier

The service was fine, just a little slow. The pizzas were ok, the dough had a lot of dried flour which did not make a lot of sense‚Ä¶ and the half/half pizza they made us pay the highest price but the more expensive pizza was the smallest in the tray not cool.

Excellent Pizza: the bread is thin and the pizza feels light, but it's very tasty and fulfilling. They gave me a bottle of spicy olive oil which added a nice touch. Adequate pricing.
The only downside is that the place is a bit small and not very well located.
Great food, great ambient and the waitress was extremelly kind
Very good Italian food!! Especially the lasagna and pizzas. Friendly and helpful staff. Would recommend going there!
Great local place for breakfast or brunch!
Very large bakery/pastry shop. Excellent service. Good product.
Bought a yougurt that was already expired. Only noticed when I got home.
It is not really great location. I got my self a bit difficult to find the location. It is small minipre√ßo but you can get all you need here. I went here on walking from University of Aveiro.

It is a small store with daily needed products, fair enough. And good prices:)
I missed some more quantity of non dairy milk and some non dairy yogurt.
It was nice, with all the daily needs for groceries and some tasty fresh croissant s and breads.
A great restaurant serving an interesting and well presented selection of tapas and wines. All at very good prices. Excellent, friendly service and a lovely owner. Highly recommended.

Really great food. We had about 5 dishes and 2 deserts, and all of them were great. You can taste the passion and love put to make the dishes. The environment is alright, but the service was a bit too slow. This cultural venue beautifully balances contemporary art exhibitions with panoramic views of the canal, appearing to float above the water on arch-supported columns. Originally built in the early 15th century as a tidal-powered watermill, the structure was developed atop the canal arches known as Casa dos Arcos. Over the 19th and 20th centuries, it served various purposes‚Äîfirst as a warehouse for coal and citrus, then as a printing house for a local newspaper, and even housed Aveiro's first steam engine. In 1903, it became home to the School of Industrial Design. From 1919, it functioned as the office of a maritime company, and from 1925 to 1993, it served as the official building for the Port Authority of Aveiro (Capitania). Following a remodeling in 2003, the ground floor was transformed into a public art gallery, while the upper floor now hosts meeting rooms for the Aveiro City Council.
Incredible view. Very cozy galeria. Friendly personal. I was at amazing part of Bienal de cer√¢mica. Amazed by art!

Located next to the central canal, this building was once the old Aveiro Harbor Master's Office and now houses a small gallery that hosts temporary exhibitions and cultural activities. Its white facade with blue accents reflects the city's traditional style, and its location, facing the moliceiros (boats) sailing along the canal, makes it a very photogenic spot during a stroll along the waterfront.
It is a symbolic gallery and building on the river or canals of Aveiro. It is an authentic place

Then submitted my one 20$ that recently came out of a US bank, and after another 5min of process, was told they couldn‚Äôt take my bill that perfectly fine. Such a waste of time. And the seller couldn‚Äôt speak English so couldn‚Äôt even explain time the issue and she got pissed off, when I was the one who just wasted almost 25 min for nothing. Ergh !

I saw an article about COLOMBIA written by a young woman who is currently interning in her INTERNATIONAL BUSINESS program, and I find your commentary on our country very special. I would like to know what impact this message has had in your newspaper and internationally. These comments reflect what the country is truly like, and I would like to make it a little more known so that people know we are in a privileged area, which the Portuguese and Europeans should visit to see the wonders we have. I look forward to your comments and thanks for publishing the very interesting article you published on February 10, 2015. Good luck and thank you.

Awesome pizzas and great people. Only complaint is that there‚Äôs no Sicilian pizza, but the food is otherwise great :) there‚Äôs also pasta for those so inclined, all of the typical ones (like Bollonesa, Carbonara).

If you're driving through a veil this is a must visit comma I repeat a must visit

Despite the negative reviews, just went there and staff was very nice, wardrobe went OK, music was a mix of English and Portuguese. Prices were a bit high, 7e for a cocktail. But overall, had a nice experience.

Be careful because they have rules they won't tell you until you want to get out in order to trick you into paying 35-50‚Ç¨, also bodyguards are unreasonably aggressive and the stuff would refuse to talk with foreign people
