I reckon the club is only for old and/or rich people.

It is gonna be a funny evening though if you don't take it too serious.
For the sake of God, please fix these speakers. They sound like stereo speakers of a Windows95.Our ears our bleeding...

We went there on a Saturday night

The music was great, it was a mixture of 80/90s and I'm always up for that
But the average age (about 40) was way above our age (21).
Also the prices are very high

Would not recomend it to people at our age

I recently visited this restaurant and had a fantastic dining experience. The steak with fries was cooked to perfection and tasted amazing. The atmosphere of the restaurant was modern and warm, making it a great spot for a cozy meal. The service was also noteworthy, as the staff was fast and kind, ensuring that I had a pleasant time. Overall, I highly recommend this restaurant for anyone looking for a delicious meal in a comfortable setting with top-notch service.

Great service. Kind and helpful staff. Splendid atmosphere. You could taste the freshness of the pizza ingredients. The pizza felt a bit dry to me, though. I think it would taste much better with more olive oil, more tomato sauce, and a tad bit more salt.

We arrived without a reservation and they gave us a table in the balcony (gorgeous balcony). At the begging it was a table without shadow, but they gave us the best from them and changed us to another one.
The service was fast, efficient and very very friendly. They made us to feel very comfortable.
As the beef as the pasta it was very tasty and fresh.
It's a must in Aveiro!
Loved this spot on the canal in Aveiro.  Great pizza, naco, pasta, and salad.  I tried the bochechas, but would have preferred a more flavorful sauce.
Very nice place.we ate outside on the deck overlooking the water.very cozy in intimate setting.

I bought the fiesta glasses, and it arrived very quickly and well packaged.
The design is slick and modern.

Inexpensive compared to local prices. A bit hidden but worth it for the quiet local along the canal.  Staff are pleasant and accommodating for large groups. The tuna stake was incredibly ample, though I prefer a bit more rare and less salt. It was delicious.

This is the place for our New Year‚Äôs Eve celebrations! My friends and I fly in every year specifically to spend the evening here, and it never disappoints. The food is consistently amazing, especially seafood is super fresh. What truly sets this spot apart is the staff‚Äîthey went above and beyond to make our night unforgettable, even staying late to accommodate us. Their warmth and dedication turned an already incredible evening into something truly special. If you‚Äôre looking for excellent food, impeccable service, and a place to create lasting memories, look no further. Highly recommend!
Top. Really tasty food and super fast service , nice personnel . Highly recommend
Very tasty, authentic food. Quiet and beautiful setting by the canal. Out of the touristy section.  Reasonable prices too

GET THE GARLIC SHRIMP!!!!
So amazing that I am currently writing this review from inside the restaurant!!
We got the couvert of the day which i highly recommend. Crackers instead of bread so it wasn‚Äôt super filling and the olives came in the tastiest olive oil. If there is one dish you have to get it is the garlic shrimp tapas. Quite literally the BEST shrimp I‚Äôve had in my entire life. I was in heaven, it was bliss. So amazing. You have to get it, the portion is also generous and comes with 10+ big shrimp.

The octopus tapas was also really good and has a unique seasoning and sauce. It wasn‚Äôt chewy at all, even though octopus usually is. We also got the goat cheese salad which was good with fresh dressing and cheese. Lastly we got the steak. While it was good, it doesn‚Äôt compare to the rest of the meal. It still has a good flavor and tenderness and came with delicious potato wedges and sauce.

10/10 amazing loved it. Waitress was super nice, restaurant was beautiful.

Everything was outstanding.
Elfeu at the front desk is the example of the perfect customer service: polite, professional, knowledgeable, patient. Elfeu answered all our questions and we never felt rushed.
The room is immaculate, the toiletries are excellent, the continental breakfast is wonderful with a big choice of fruit, yogurts, pastries, coffees, milks (we were very happy to see the soy one), the beds are comfortable and the linen is superb. You couldn‚Äôt wish for a better location.
If we are ever in this area again, with no hesitation we will book our stay at this hotel.

This hotel was a little gem. It is located 50m from the town centre. Currently they have merged with the hotel next door so the entrance is on the other side.
We were greeted by enthusiastic staff who were friendly. They offered to store our luggage till our room was ready.
They gave us recommendations for a restaurant for lunch and for the river cruise.
When we got back from walking about, the staff had already transferred our luggage to our room. A lovely touch which was very appreciated.
The room was comfortable and clean. We enjoyed our one night here.

The location is good, but keep in mind that you can only leave your luggage at the hotel and the parking lot is about a 5-minute walk away. The bed in the room for two people was too narrow (I think 140 cm), view could be better, but the room was clean and the breakfast was ok.

Great boutique hotel, pretty much at the centre of town. Easy to walk around. Rooms were lovely and welcoming, and beds were very comfortable. Staff were welcoming and accommodating, couldn't fault service at all
What a great place, the rooms are fantastic, functional and comfortable, staff are attentive and friendly, and the Breakfast is amazing!!!

Hip new boutique hotel across the street from the canals. Modern & chic rooms with high tech lighting, big flat screen TV‚Äôs, super comfortable beds, luxury bedding, & cool bidet toilets. Breakfast is included and marvelous dinner options are available in their chef driven restaurant. (Ask for the menu.) There is a lobby bar and lots of shared spaces for gathering. Coming soon is a roof top bar with some of the best views of Aveiro! I‚Äôll be back to enjoy that!! Could improve on: More hot options for breakfast and replenishing more frequently and softer, more luxurious towels.

Such a lovely hotel. Modern spacious rooms in a Nordic style with little chocolates and treats in the room. The staff are particularly friendly and helpful and nothing is too much trouble. The breakfast is great too, a good selection of things, and you can even have an evening meal there, which is also delicious and recommended. The location is superb and very central to everything in Aveiro so you can walk around easily. If you are staying in Aveiro this is a perfect place.

This was my second time here and the hotel is really modern, nice and clean.

My only problem as a vegetarian is the meat and cheese placement at breakfast. They should not put them on the same plate.
Surprising! Spacious rooms, elegant d√©cor, and comfort that exceeds expectations. The staff is fantastic and makes the experience even more special.
Excellent service and rooms. Breakfast is good

Bordalo II's R√£ is one of the most iconic works by Portuguese artist Bordalo II, known for his urban installations made from discarded materials and recycled waste. This enormous, colorful frog is part of the "Big Trash Animals" series, with which the artist denounces human impact on the environment and the destruction of biodiversity.

Reflective Art
The work, visible in several Portuguese cities, is constructed entirely from discarded plastic, metal, rubber, and everyday objects, transformed into a gigantic, surprisingly lifelike and powerful animal. The R√£ (frog), in addition to its strong visual impact, sends a clear message: nature suffers under the weight of our waste.

Why see it?
- It's an extraordinary example of sustainable street art.
- It's striking for its creativity, technique, and social significance.
- Perfect for lovers of urban photography and engaged art.
- It symbolizes the new face of Portuguese contemporary art.

In short: Bordalo II's R√£ is not just an urban sculpture, but a powerful visual statement and a form of artistic activism that leaves its mark.
Weird timetable, bus kinda comes when it wants, AC inside the bus, which is nice. Ticket to Costa Nova was 2,40 EUR / person.
Surrealistic dreamy postcard-like place with nice caf√©s and restaurants nearby.
30 minutes delay! They don't care at all about their own schedules. If you are in a hurry because you need to take a train or bus, do not trust them, better take a taxi
We really wanted to see Costa Nova, but we resigned after waiting for a bus that was 25minutes late... ridiculous
We were waiting for bus 30 minutes upper timetable

place_name: Restaurante El Guacamole Aveiro Cantina Mexicana
review_text: Nice Mexican restaurant! Very friendly staff and great atmosphere! The food was great. We ordered some nachos and guacamole, which were great, but it could have a bit more guacamole. As main dish, we ordered a Tijuana Chicken Quesadilla and Chilaquiles del Mexico, and were fantastic! The only con is that the orders took a while.

place_name: Restaurante El Guacamole Aveiro Cantina Mexicana
review_text: The food was all good, all the dishes were well served and were a nice portion. The staf is very friendly and very helpful when in doubt of what to choose.

place_name: Restaurante El Guacamole Aveiro Cantina Mexicana
review_text: This shop is amazing, the appetizer crunchy chicken tacos are superb and definitely must order here. Fajitas vitela was excellent great margaritas, even Mexican beer. Definitely stop and try this shop you will be happy you did. To top it off churros for dessert. Staff is amazing and friendly and the atmosphere is just fun.

place_name: Restaurante El Guacamole Aveiro Cantina Mexicana
review_text:
El Guacamole in Aveiro is an absolute gem! From the moment you step inside, you're transported to the heart of Mexico. The vibrant decor, lively music, and warm atmosphere create an immersive experience.

The food is simply outstanding. Every dish we tried was bursting with flavor and authenticity. The service was incredibly fast and the staff were friendly and attentive. It's clear that a lot of care goes into creating a fantastic dining experience.

If you're craving delicious Mexican cuisine in a fun and energetic setting, El Guacamole is a must-visit!

place_name: Restaurante El Guacamole Aveiro Cantina Mexicana
review_text: OMG!  This is the best Mexican food in Europe.   If this was in New Mexico I would still give it 5 stars.  It is truly amazing.   I am an American ex pat (3 years) and have never had such great food this side of the Atlantic.  Aveiro is wonderful, but even if it wasn't, I would come just to eat here.

I stayed in the summer of 2021. It's fine, but the bathroom is shared with other rooms. There were four of us, a very small room, no closet or TV. You have a shared kitchen and garden, and they made up the excuse that breakfast was due to COVID, but then you share the bathroom??? And there's no parking.
The price is high for what it is.
Very clean and attentive staff, good location almost in the city center.

Super clean and tidy hostel. Absolutely fantastic value for money. Very centrally located. We didn't find Aveiro itself that great; the only thing you can do is take a boat through the canal, but that's a bit disappointing. You're better off spending a day at the beach in Costa Nova.
Very friendly. The location is great, and the rooms are very clean and well-kept. A very quiet place I would return to on a future visit to the city.

place_name: Jo√£o Pitorra - M√©dico Especialista Ouvidos, Nariz e Garganta
review_text: Excellent doctor for children. Very good professional.

Here you will find support for immigrants. Very good service, they help you to make a statement of interest, they can also register you to take Portuguese courses. They are very kind, everything is very good. ‚ò∫Ô∏è

Built in 1568 by Andr√© Dias Caldeira, this chapel features a centralized circular floor plan, distinguishing it from the more common hexagonal chapels of the region. The interior is richly decorated with Sevillian-style azulejos and elaborate stucco work. A striking sculpture of Saint Bartholomew capturing a demon stands at the main altar, reflecting the chapel‚Äôs unique iconography. The chapel is generally closed to the public, but opens once a year on August 24, the feast day of Saint Bartholomew, which is tied to the local Diabo Solto (loose devil) legend and festivities.
Amazing, there is so much to visit
A very cozy, clean house with all the details. Highly recommended.

Has a surprisingly decent collection of social science and psychology books in English. Many other domains like art and architecture also contains English books as well. It‚Äôs their new location I think - beautiful building. Easy to spent hours here without notice.
The best library! My the most favourite one.

I was really disappointed with the food. The burger was covered in so much BBQ sauce that it was messy and hard to eat, and the pork was oily, greasy, and tough ‚Äî it didn‚Äôt taste fresh, maybe because it was the weekend. The service wasn‚Äôt great either. The waitress was quite rude and couldn‚Äôt even answer simple questions, like which drink was included in the daily menu. Unfortunately, I wouldn‚Äôt recommend this place.

Nice local cafe where we had the best Pork ribs on spicy wedges.
They were sticky bbq goodness  & very tasty with a local vino!
I‚Äôm sure other items on the menu would be just as good.
I've been craving a francesinha for the entire short trip in Portugal, and this one was amazing. I'll definitely go back to eat here

The worst service ever. Noisy place, tables one on top of each other. One of those times we came to Aveiro and wanted to have lunch and enjoy our time spending. We chose one of the free tables outside for 2 people. The woman attended us and immediately started creating problems,  insisting for us to go as far as possible to the Conner, where was just one chair and no possibility to pass. I stayed with the sensation that I came to some dining room, but the workers are thinking they are in a great restaurant with all 3 Michelin stars. But it was great, as Aveiro has a lot of amazing places and we had amazing dish and enjoyed the atmosphere in the place right to this snobish dining room

Fish soup is nice, fried potatoes is OK. Pasta and grilled salmon... Don't order. Ovo moles crepe too sweet. Fried Calamari don't try. Coffee is nice. Waitress is friendly but I hope they serve better quality foods

Central location, with an excellent quality-price ratio. This August Saturday is a bit crowded, so the service is a little slow. The food is really good with a nice selection. The waiters are very friendly and hardworking. I definitely recommend it.

Super authentic and affordable place to grab a delicious snack or meal and drinks. It's almost like the "Cheers" of Aveiro where everybody knows your name. Not the best if you're in a hurry or a rush, but if you've got time to chill and hang, they'll take care of you. Their food is fantastic! (There's also TVs if you're hoping to watch sporting.)

One of our favourite places in Aveiro. Good and friendly service, delicious food. Salmon with potatoes and vegetables was  just marvellous. And as for their special Francesinha, it has the best sauce I ever tried in Portugal

This used to be my go to place for a nice Portuguese lunch on the patio. Unfortunately (as tends to happen) they‚Äôve ‚Äúcommercialized‚Äù. The plates are smaller and not as tasty with less sides. But the worst part that I can‚Äôt dismiss is the ‚ÄúPrato do dia‚Äù or daily special‚Ä¶ it‚Äôs not special. They basically copy and paste from the menu what they want to highlight. That may not see that big of a deal, but you‚Äôre not getting anything extra or any cheaper, and as far as Portuguese restaurants go‚Ä¶ if someone says Prato do Dia you expect one of those two. Sad.

Good quality food right in the center of Aveiro. Close to the station, Forum and Rossio. The view is great and you have a variety of table locations to pick (sidewalk/terrace, indoor and balcony indoor).
I would recommend this apartment to anyone looking to stay in Aveiro. The location and the space of the apartment are both perfect

Accommodation is Superb.
The place is excellent all round.
Location is central to everything.
Train station is approx 10 15 min walk.
Taxi is approx 8 euro.
Eating out is much cheaper than Lisbon.
If you're into interior decorating, they have beautiful shops here filled with many treasures.
Easy to walk, about.
Very safe.
Airbnb type apartment. Self door code entry. Excellent location
Potentially the best location to consider. The apartment was clean and well equipped. Would recommend without hesitation.

Overall is good, location and decoration style, as well as the free parking area where only 500m away.
The bedroom has only one double bed, this against the two single beds I chose on booking.
No washing machine. No laundry room, at least on my floor.

Best ceramic, glass and art store store in Portugal. Rather than mass, touristy products, this store focus on Portuguese local products. Beautiful designs, not cheap but they‚Äôre high quality. We bought 2 coffee cups and a set of 4 espresso cup/saucer.
They also have stores in Lisbon.

I entered this very well-kept and excellent quality shop to buy a set of knives and came out with 4 sets of 8-piece plates and cutlery. Since I live in Italy, they very kindly sent them to me without any problems for a moderate cost, taking great care in the packaging!‚Ä¶ Highly recommended!!
Incredible store and everything very beautiful, prices for all budgets, but what you like most will have a price according to its design

Very kind staff, very beautiful location, and fair prices! I totally recommend it. The coffee shop is located next to the river, you can have a drink here and enjoy the view. Especially in the evening, it is very quiet and peaceful.
Very friendly.  Lovely outside seating.  Had cappuccino but it tasted more like a hot cocoa.

Coffee shop and snack bar very close to the Forum Aveiro mall and also very close to the center of town, with an outside seating space where you can lunch or have a drink just over the water branch where all the moliceiro boats travel. Pa king (paid) nearby at Forum Aveiro (2 minutes walk) or Mercado Manuel Firmino (same distance). Service is fast and friendly, prices rather low considering the location.
Love the food, the service and the outdoor seating! Always fresh and tasty, well-balanced meals. A favourite for a workday lunch. Thank you, Cais 3!
I like having lunch here. It's a good value and a great atmosphere right on the canal.

The apartment is very nice, it has all the necessary utensils if you want to cook. I'm giving it 3 stars because, due to a problem they had, they gave me a late check-out. To my surprise, when I went to enter the building, the code didn't work. They didn't extend it or notify me of a new code, so I had to wait a while for someone to enter or leave the building. Zero attention in that respect. Otherwise, everything was fine.

Bought a lether wallet, great quality.
The employes are very helpfull and very pleasant.

Excellent food ! We enjoyed very much
And the owners are super nice and awesome !
thank you
at√© logo

Good pizza but nothing special. Price was on the expensive side.
Great pizza, great service advice to visit the place

place_name: Lavandaria Speed Queen, Praia da Barra
review_text: Has to be one of the best self service  laundry‚Äôs I‚Äôve visited in a long time . The machines look new or close to , there are four various load capacity washing machines starting at ‚Ç¨4.90 for 8kg and four dryers of two different loads starting at ‚Ç¨1.40 per ten minute period . The machines are super clean as is the whole shop , there is a children‚Äôs area and seating as you wait , good sized tables with clean baskets for your washing . This is a good place to go with plenty of free parking close by .

place_name: Lavandaria Speed Queen, Praia da Barra
review_text: Very clean self service  laundry with excellent modern machines and very keenly priced . It‚Äôs located close to car parks and with in easy walking distance from the car parks . There are 4 washing machines from small load to very large load and 4 dryers , also an animal clothing dryer . This is a lovely pkace to do all your laundry.

place_name: Lavandaria Speed Queen, Praia da Barra
review_text:
If Carlsberg did Launderettes -THIS is it.

Well maintained, hi-tech, very clean, spacious, well equipped launderette. The team working there were very helpful and friendly.

35min wash ‚Ç¨4.30 /drying @‚Ç¨1.20/10mins.
The machines have built-in detergent feeding the washers. Different size machines for 8/10kg etc. I also spotted two machines (washer & drier) specifically dedicated for pet bedding.

You can get a loyalty card for washing if you're a regular visitor or pay with contactless for one-off visit.

Instructions on wall and machine are well sign-posted in multi-languages.
The place also offers free WiFi.

Best launderette I've visited in Europe so far!

Obrigado!! üôèüèº

place_name: Lavandaria Speed Queen, Praia da Barra
review_text: Very nice place!  Easy to use, takes credit cards, and very fast.  Had a problem with a spin cycle not competing and the owner saw I had a problem via camera and came within a few minutes.

place_name: Lavandaria Speed Queen, Praia da Barra
review_text: Great laundromat easy to use plenty parking and pizza nxt door
Nice & helping staff

Most of online transactions get rejected when I attempt to pay with my ActivoBank debit card. Trying to buy train tickets (cp.pt), TAP flights or other large organizations, it does not matter they always fail at the bank verification step.
Multiple calls to ActivoBank online assistance did not help.
Multiple visits to ActivoBank Aveiro office did not resolve the problem either.
This is unbearable and I am in the process of switching to another bank.
Nice and helpful staff
good experience

Very pleased with the services, high attention to your needs. Polite and friendly staff, with a professional attitude. I highly recommend!
Top

cool place with nice drinks
Probably nice for a drink or two but do not expect much in terms of food ... Took ages to be served, order incomplete, no sense of prioritization, ...

review_text: Very good service
Great store in a delightfully restored vintage building
I highly recommend it.

review_text: TOP
Incredibly friendly, competent, takes his time, great results. We felt very comfortable!!!
Excellent service and very pleasant
The best and coolest hairdresser in town!

Price is fair at 10 euro for a pass, has enough equipment for anything, is lacking plates for sure++ if you have more than one person using bench/smith/hip thrusts there won't be enough plates.

Intern called "G" gave me a good tour and a chat!

Excellent gym where I visited only once and probably never come back again but thats just because I was tourist visiting this area. 7 euros for one visit.. well its something but I think you get cheaper price for many visits. There is all equipment, free weights, and machines in multiple rooms,  lots of space, good showers etc. There is some group activities that might be good but I didnt try. This gym is highly recommended by me! Friendly staff!

I travel frequently and it's hard to find gyms that provide short term access. I checked out gym T√≥nico and Jos√© was very helpful. I managed to get a weeks pass (7days) for 20 euros. This has all the equipment you need for any training session. Smith/cable machines, Olympic free weights, rigs, cardio equipment and classes. It's never too full and the gym users are friendly and polite. Everything is clean and tidy. Music is low key, not intrusive at all. I really liked this place. Recommended!
Nice, cozy gym, not really big but enough big to have everything what needed to have a good training!

The gym is good. The service is bad. I was in vacation. paying 10‚Ç¨. They said it's for one day. So I went in the morning.. then in the evening they said it's not available. Only get in once. Really dissapointed. The machines are good.

The waiter worked super hard, but I t there were not enough staff for the number of people, so the service was super slow. The kitchen didn't supply all the dishes we had ordered.
Food was OK, and the view is great. Fantastic location, with smart sitting. Expensive, but if you come for a drink with a book at the waterfront, it's spot on.

The food is absolutely not worth it. Ordered the warm Italian sandwich, it got served without the pesto sauce so sent it back and got it returned cold with a spoonful of pesto splattered in the middle. Another one of us ordered the cold tuna sandwich and got served the warm one so also had to send it back. Another one of us ordered the octopus and it was swimming in oil. Ordered bread as a side but it never came, got charged for it and had to ask to remove it from the bill ... Also ordered the Mango passion fruit juice but it was unavailable, then ordered the Mango pineapple but it was also unavailable, so had to stick to orange juice. Completely not worth the time and money.

Really pleasant experience.Loved the setting overlooking the canal.Menu was good and the prices excellent.Our meals were very tasty and rather large so maybe consider sharing if you have smaller appetites.Service was also efficient.
Highly Recommend
Must visit, eat&drink in Aveiro! Perfect spot!

Took 20minutes just to get our order taken.
The garlic shrimp was tasteless, the calamari was poor, the fries were too salty and the octopus salad was disgustingly smelly and off.

Once we sent it back, we were given a new plate that we obviously didn‚Äôt eat.
They took the octopus salad off our final bill but had to pay the rest.

I hope I won‚Äôt get sick tonight.
Please don‚Äôt go.

Sat on the front as it looked like a nice place to sit and have a drink. I  waited for someone to service us, one one came. Then asked a waiter if we could have some drinks. He said yes... 15minutes later no one came near us to take our order,so we just got up and left without any drinks. Very poor and disappointing
Say for 15 minutes abd no one came to ask if we wanted a drink. Had to ask fir a menu then again waited another 10minutes and no-one came so like the last review got up and left terrible service.
Great atmosphere. Great food. Great service. Great location. We had fresh sardinwa and mussels and a great time with live music.
I had a delicious chicken sandwich and my friend had a cheese and ham sandwich. Both were delicious. Service was professional and the location and decor good.
Bad service, low quality food, overpriced, small portions - skip it!

Location was excellent. Host Joao was wonderful..even brought us a bottle of wine.
Yes, many tourists stop to take pictures of house. The neighborhood is lively,  lots of bars and  university students singing late into the night...but we did not mind that. House is super cute and clean. More pillows would be nice.

Such a great place to stay in beautiful and charming Aveiro!! This was our first destination in Portugal and the house was perfect. Clean, comfortable, pretty, spacious - everything the (Airbnb) photos promised.... And photograph worthy it is, especially from the outside! Most days on our return from our excursions we found people posing in front of and snapping pics of the house! Very cute. Fortunately the main entrance is on the side of the house, so we could come and go without much fear of photo bombing :) As the owner will tell you, it does get very loud on the street outside at night and continues well into the early hours of the morning, so earplugs are a must if you are at all sensitive to noise (unless you are planning on being out there for the fun literally every night :)). Still very well worth a stay, just be prepared. Great place and great location.
Beautiful place on the canal and very inexpensive. Lots of restaurants and bars around it, so not the spot if you want a quiet night.
Great lunch spot for a delicious, satisfying and super healthy homemade meal. Very friendly staff too!

This is my new favorite place in Aveiro. I was there a few days ago with my family and we all loved it. The place feels very welcoming, the owner is incredibly sweet and the food was beyond delicious!! I like that they pretty much have the daily menu which must always be so good, fresh and prepared with lots of love. We had a delicious lentil cake with rice and vegetables followed by a very good and healthy desert. I look forward to going back there again when I visit.
Ki always has amazing and conforting food, good vibes and lovely staff.

Great vegan/vegetarian food. Would say it's a truly home cooked  experience without the animal protein. Different menus every week, so lots to try. Amazing vegan deserts. Hard to park in front but close to lots of paid parking lots. Cash only place by the way.

So disappointing. We expected crisp fresh food and were presented with chickpeas and vegetables that had the the consistency of baby food and overly sweet. The carrots (the only identifiable vegetable) were so mushy, I expect they were frozen. Way overpriced for what you get.
Nice people, though.
Incredible

place_name: NORMAL Aveiro, Av. Dr. Louren√ßo Peixinho
review_text: Gosh, what a big store! I thoroughly enjoyed it. Just one suggestio, though I‚Äôm sure there‚Äôs a reason for the layout. I personally like to browse everything first and then return to the beginning to buy what I want. That was a bit difficult to do her, it felt like a maze. It seemed like I had to exit the store and re-enter to get back to the start. Or maybe I just happened to visit on a particularly busy day. Either way, the store itself is fantastic!

place_name: NORMAL Aveiro, Av. Dr. Louren√ßo Peixinho
review_text:
The store is nice but they have too many issues. The corridors are narrow, some passages are blocked, and an elevator just for the staff. The store is designed to go one way, and blocked passages are not a good idea. I let the manager know about this, but he kept saying that we needed someone to use the elevator. The problem is that staff was not around when we requested.
It's not a good place for wheelchairs and strollers.

place_name: NORMAL Aveiro, Av. Dr. Louren√ßo Peixinho
review_text: The wanna-be Ikea principle on the tiny footprint is deplorable. Walk in, pick up a toothpaste right at the entrance, the check-out is two yards to your left, yet a security person sends you through the whole two-level store to get to the register right where you've been. Big Brother visiting?

place_name: NORMAL Aveiro, Av. Dr. Louren√ßo Peixinho
review_text: Not NORMAL at all ‚Äì the security guard made me go up two floors just to buy something that was right by the exit.

place_name: NORMAL Aveiro, Av. Dr. Louren√ßo Peixinho
review_text: Makes you walk through the entire shop, even upstairs with no shortcuts. Unacceptable waste of time

This spot is a total gem! You must try the Santa Juana, best drink I‚Äôve had in a while. Service was great, vibe was chill and the views are priceless. The Bolhinas de Alheira (sausage balls) are incredibly tasty and 1000% worth the calories.

This venue has great potential but still a lot of room for improvement. For drinks only it is probably suitable but if you‚Äôre going to eat then you might face challenges. We were a group of four and ordered 5 meals and only 3 arrived. The missing two never arrived, maybe they forgot about them and after finishing the other three we decided not to remind them of the missing orders. Also, each of the 3 orders delivered took a long time to arrive and between each at least 15 minutes. The meals were good though. Small details also missing like no fork and knife for the toast, etc. Staff is friendly and mostly very young folks, which probably explains some level of desorganization. The view from the top is well worth the visit but to eat it is better to go somewhere else.
Kind of a hidden cafe in a rooftop. You should take the elevator to the 6th floor and walk up one floor to get to the rooftop. You will have the view of Aveiro.

Lovely cocktails and the staff was great too! The view of the city is fantastic.

Little tip - the lift doesn‚Äôt go all the way to the 7th floor. Take the lift to the 6th and walk a flight of stairs to get to the bar.

My boyfriend and I went here a few days ago and we almost missed this place as it is not really advertised. We only saw it when we looked up to the sky to see the bright neon light "Terra√ßo" and realised this might be a bar. The entry was hard to find as, again, it was not advertised. But once we got to the seventh floor, it was a beautiful experience. The staff were really friendly, the atmosphere was great and I had a wonderful pornstar martini. And last but not least, the view was amazing.

place_name: L√°serum Aveiro | Depila√ß√£o a laser d√≠odo
review_text:
Victoria was absolutely amazing! I don‚Äôt speak very good Portuguese but she spoke to me in Portuguese because I told her I wanted to learn and practice, and when I didn‚Äôt understand she translated to English perfectly!

She was highly educated and very efficient.

I highly recommend visiting laserum in Aveiro! The clinic was also very clean and sanitary.

place_name: L√°serum Aveiro | Depila√ß√£o a laser d√≠odo
review_text: All the people wotking here are very nice and professionals. The place is nice and always very clean and I was able to see results after 3 sessions as explained. Price is also very good. So overall I had really a positive experience.

place_name: L√°serum Aveiro | Depila√ß√£o a laser d√≠odo
review_text: The service was great! Tabata does an amazing job explaining the process and after care. Highly recommend

place_name: L√°serum Aveiro | Depila√ß√£o a laser d√≠odo
review_text: First time having laser, Isabelle was friendly and professional and made me feel very comfortable, explaining everything in detail. The salon is easy to reach and very clean and tidy. Looking forward to having more sessions.

place_name: L√°serum Aveiro | Depila√ß√£o a laser d√≠odo
review_text:
I had a great experience  with Laserum Specially "Victoria" she is super friendly & very polite. Most of the time she adjusted her timetable to open early to meet my timing.
Thankyou for your professionalism.
located next to very noisy bars, impossible to get a good night's sleep.

place_name: Multiaveiro - Projectos de Forma√ß√£o e Investimentos, Lda
review_text: Horrible service still waiting for a answer after two weeks of sending emails

We go to Aveiro once a month and I usually make an effort to go to the M Bakery because it‚Äôs so much fun. There is something new every time!
It‚Äôs a groovy Instagram worthy pink as can be love letter to beautiful confections and really good food prepared well. I‚Äôve been here over a dozen times and never had the same thing. There is always something new I want to try. The service is great and I‚Äôll definitely return.
The only thing I don‚Äôt like is that they have to unlock the restroom/water closet and let you in.

The place is beautiful, well-kept, and full of charming details. Everything is pink and just divine! I ordered a shrimp salad, and it was amazing‚Äîthe shrimp were coated with almond slices. The next day I came back for breakfast, and the coffee was excellent. They also offer plant-based milks, which is a great touch.

Stopped for a quick lunch and we both enjoyed our food. I had the Shrimp Toast and my husband had the Mixed Croissant the Shrimp Toast was great, with a little kick to it. The croissant had a very generous amount of meat in it

What a lovely patisserie with a fantastic selection of pastries and baked goods. We tried three different cakes and loved them all - the favorite was probably ‚ÄúMademoiselle.‚Äù The cappuccino and BonBon coffee were fine (though the BonBon was a bit too sweet for my taste). Overall, highly recommend & I just wish they‚Äôd open one in Lisbon!

The pastry is amazing! Everything is beautifully decorated and looks delicious. The croissant framboise is divine! The only downside was the waiting time. I had to wait a couple of minutes just for someone to hand me my takeaway pastry, which was already prepared.

Breakfast Bliss in Aveiro.

Stumbled into Caf√© NATA Lisboa while hunting for breakfast near our flat ‚Äî and hit the jackpot! Hot coffee, warm rolls, and heavenly Past√©is de Nata to start the day right.

Best part? The super friendly staff gave us an impromptu Portuguese lesson every morning. Pleasant atmosphere, huge selection ‚Äî we‚Äôll be back!

Nice little cafee that serves also small tasty dishes and icecream. Be aware they add 10% on the bill for outdoor service. Strange, because outdoor seating is just at the dorstep. They mention that discreetly on the bottom of the menue in very small letters. You have to pay inside anyway. OK, so no tips from me.

Nice caf√© with a friendly and welcoming staff. Everything was good, but the highlight for me was the pastel de nata ‚Äì honestly, the best I‚Äôve ever had in Portugal.  With a noticeable hint of cardamom (which I like). Even better than the ones from Pastel de Bel√©m in Lisbon!

This coffee place have all the right condition to be amazing. With great location and modern vibe.  The food was also ok, with classic sandwiches and salads and coffee which isnt the best we had but not the worse either. Prices are moderate-high but for the location it's ok I guess.
I give 3 and not 4 for 2 main reasons: a. They didn't have baby-chair which is not understandable to me, with such small investment, you can make a huge difference for such a big audience. Honestly, it was the first place in the city which didn't have one. b. We got charged for an orange juice that was missing for the Manu. It took them a while to let us know and in the end we saw it on the bill.
Anyway I would not overrule this place for a nice  brunch on a weekday.

Nice place with vegetarian options. Had a light lunch (quiche menu), the quiche was very nice, the salad was drowning in oil. The pastel de nata is very good. The restaurand is clean and pleasent, staff is nice.
There's a parking lot in this square so you can leave your car and walk to the canal area... Very close.

Very good service, the artist was very patient when I took my friend for her first tattoo. He made us great designs.10/10 would work with him again.

P.D. He gave us great prices too ;)
Top top!! ‚ù§
Very professional, with good offers!
Excellent service. The response was quick and they adapted to our needs and schedule. Of all the agencies we contacted, they were undoubtedly the most professional.

place_name: Michelly Sousa Especialista em sobrancelhas e lash lifting
review_text: "Highly recommended! I loved the work she did on my eyebrows. She's very detail-oriented, careful, and professional. The atmosphere is comfortable, clean, and relaxing, and the result was exactly what I wanted: beautiful, natural, and long-lasting eyebrows. I will definitely be back. Thank you for excellent service!"

place_name: Casa do Carril by Casas de Aveiro
review_text:
A charming house decorated with attention to detail, and a very pleasant stay.
We'll be back üòä
Top

Esta pastelaria est√° sob nova dire√ß√£o. Uma empresa familiar com funcion√°rios simp√°ticos, uma grande sele√ß√£o de pastelaria e uma decora√ß√£o completamente nova! √ìtimo lugar para tomar um caf√© e a 5 minutos da avenida principal.

This pastry shop is under new management. A family-run business with friendly staff, a great selection of pastries and a completely new decor! Great place to have a coffee and 5 minutes from the main avenue.

I gave 1 because i cant give 0. The cookies werent fresh. After i got products i decided to buy more and the cashier behaved so bad. He sweared in portuguese because he thought i dont understand portuguese. No reason to go there again.
The cookies were below average. Nothing we ate was fresh and the cashier was really rude.
Upgraded tourist trap. Employees do not say even good morning, very cold staff. If u have a baby, avoid - no place to change a diaper and air con is off, it‚Äôs cold .
Very friendly staff, premium choice of pastries and great location.
Top!

The experience of buying a pair of shoes to my kid in this store was amazing. The guy who helped me was very nice. We just get it just to watch and we ended with a pair of basketball shoes at amazing price.
This shop is very good service. Very good person.
I loved the atmosphere of the Beira neighborhood in Aveiro, the walk along the estuary, and the streets with terraces where you can enjoy good Portuguese cuisine at a very affordable price.
It's a beautiful place, worth seeing as a quick getaway, especially for the nearby beach called Costa Nova with its painted houses; that I found spectacular.
Very cool to visit and take the typical Aveiro boat ride.

Monte Lo Que Mia, and a 40-minute gondola ride through the canals, 15 minutes per person.
August 2025
It is a very beautiful area of Aveiro, to walk and see beautiful buildings

The food was incredibly delicious ‚Äì every dish was full of flavor, and the dessert was just as amazing. The service was outstanding: attentive, friendly, and genuinely engaged. You can really feel that the staff cares. For the price, it‚Äôs unbeatable. Highly recommended!

We were super surprised by the prices provided here at Plaza Grill, so much so that we did internally question whether the food would be good or not.

We can confirm the food was indeed cooked beautifully, with some lovely flavours.

We took Breaded Chicken and Breaded Fish, together with a local Portuguese dessert which was reaaaally good!

Thumbs up to the servers who were really nice and had a great attitude.

Great place for a good meal for a reasonable price. Menu was also in English, staff was friendly and helpful and also spoke very well English. For the menu with squid I paid 15e and it was definitely worth it - the portion was big, food flavourful and done to perfection, white house wine was nice and menu included great cup of coffee. Would definitely return to try some of the other dishes!

There are couple of notes to write down. First of all, the waiter was very kind. Second, meals were amazing. We went full menu - pore soup was super nice as a starter. Then dorada fish with vegetable and salat and potatoes. Super delicious, crispy on top and tender meat underneath, the best. Last one dessert - home made dulce de leche and egg cream with biscuits. After that coffee or tea on the house. Having two stomachs, we would made another round. Price/portion ratio amazing - 20‚Ç¨ per person for such the meal is mind-blowing. We will be there again one time.
We had the most welcoming time &service. The owners and staff are super friendly and the food & drink delicious and such good value. Thankyou & I hope we come again.

Perfect place to take a break and do some people watching in Aveiro. The food was excellent, freshly prepared and tasty; we had a chicken burger & fries and a tuna toasty washed down with a couple of draught beers (Super Bock).
The service was efficient and friendly and everything was clean and tidy including the toilets.
We loved the atmosphere. Very chilled out with a feeling of mixing with the locals rather than super touristy. There was a choice of tables in the shade or the sun. This was good for us as we had our dog with us.
We highly recommend this place, thanks to the team for a great experience.

Verily, Cafe Central dost provide a fair experience. With coffee and ale to quench one‚Äôs thirst, it serveth well as a place for respite. The attendants, most courteous and diligent, addeth a touch of warmth to the visit. The prices art reasonable, neither extravagant nor miserly, befitting the quality of what one doth receive. In sum, it is a place of modest satisfaction, where one finds precisely that for which they have paid.

Abosolute worst service I‚Äôve ever encountered. Waited around an hour for simple bifana, and when we received the food it was cold! The drinks were quick and cold. If you‚Äôre looking for somewhere to get a quick drink or cocktail, this place is great. Otherwise, don‚Äôt even bother ordering food.

Order food but it never arrived, only got the drinks, when questioned about food it was reordered by still never arrived after another 20 minutes, staffing  was not adequate for amount of customers and drinks were expensive. When staff told about service they shrugged it off as if they didn‚Äôt care . Would definitely not recommend

Late-Night Lifesaver in Aveiro!

It was late in Aveiro, and we were starving, after five failed attempts at places with kitchens closed after 9 PM. Then we found this pub ‚Äî our true lifesaver. Delicious tapas, juicy burgers, cold draft beer, and great prices.

What truly made the night was the service. Andr√© welcomed us with kindness, even with the rain and all our indecisiveness, before finally settling inside. He made us feel right at home. So glad I brought my friends here on their first night in Aveiro!

The apartment location is good, close to most attractions, restaurants and some rooms are overlooking the canal. We didn't face any issues with noise. They have secured access in the building and the apartment through numerical coded locks. There was street parking but that was always taken, nearest public carpark was 7 min walk.

The apartment was decent size with one bedroom and a big living room with an open kitchen. However, the apartment was quite dirty, the floors weren't cleaned. The kitchen towel smelled rancid. The lighting was dim in the bedroom (plenty of sunlight in the living room). The sofa-cum-bed was very creaky. The shower amenities were broken.

The team was very attentive, they have many other apartments, if those are in better condition then I would recommend, but the one that we stayed in was just passable.

Modern.   Good location.  Lovely comfortable bed and sofa.  Good wifi.  Very poor lighting inside.  Can't see to cook.  2 ring hob.  Lovely fridge freezer.  Lots of storage.   No mirror's except in the bathroom, which has poor lighting. I would recommend one on the entrance wall where lighting is good.   Good security.  Only a 5 minute drive by taxi from rail station.  I would recommend this place for it's location and comfort.
Excellent location! Very nice flat for 2 adults. Not so much for 4 adults. The sofa bed is too bad, if you count on using it prepare for a difficult night...maybe good enough for kids though.
Spacious  , well-situated apartment with great views through huge windows! One side looks out on a small, stone chapel, the other side looks out on one of the canals!
Very spacious/good value for the price. A nice&quiet&lovely little fishing town. Not much to do but great for a weekend getaway.

Stumbled upon this restaurant while walking around town and it was such a great spot. We got the calamari and the fried fish. Everything tasted great and fresh. They sprinkle the sea salt onto the fish so it was salty but regardless was great.

Near the camel, with water view. Food was great, drinks were great.  I had the cod , clams In garlic wine sauce with the passion fruit sangria,  love it! Service was great, attentive,  good vibes, and atmosphere with fair prices.

You absolutely must experience the warm atmosphere and friendly staff here; it's truly unparalleled! The food is exceptional and will leave you wanting more. I wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone looking for a fantastic dining experience!
The service was perfect. The staff very friendly. We were served very fast. The food was good, especially the grilled octopus.

In my opinion, the best restaurant in Aviero. We have been here for a week and dined here 3 times. Food is good and generous portions. Most times we have shared a main course. Open long hours with the opportunity to dine late afternoon. Service is exceptional. Very friendly atmosphere and comfy. You will not be disappointed.
Very kind people and nice location

New, clean, and spacious room.
Perfect location if you want to be right in the center of town. No pub noise until the wee hours. 100% recommended.

By far the worst hotel experience to date.
We booked a room with a balcony that specified a private bathroom. What they didn't mention was that the bathroom was outside the room and you had to walk down the hallway in the middle of the night to get to it.
They also didn't mention the noise and vibration in the bed in the middle of the night caused by the bar downstairs. Rather than condoms at the entrance, they should have given out earplugs, and even then, as far as I could tell.
The worst part of all was that when we contacted the management, we found the phone was off, and when they answered the next morning (because there's no reception), they just washed their hands of it, saying, "What the hell are we surprised about?"
An unimaginable lack of professionalism in the face of a problem unrelated to the customer.

Nice small pub with great location in the hearth of Coimbra. Highly recommended to have some beers with friends. We didn't have anything to eat but they do have a small menu. We really enjoyed the music and the sunset sitting on the outdoor area
has a TV here with sports, and ofc we love our comrade Che with a beer. but don't get their homemade fries or any food for snacks in my opinion. would still recommend

We ordered a bottle of wine for ‚Ç¨10. As with many bars in Portugal, people smoke inside so the entire place smells like cigarettes. The menu isn't extensive with snack options. There weren't any prices on the menu so we weren't sure what the price was until we were served the bill.
We enjoyed coming here for drinks. Beer served in a frosted glass and the sangria is great!

Most reasonable beer price. Small or large, same price.
Good music, would play requests.

Amazing personal service from Roberto who takes his time to ensure you get exactly what you want.

- High grade meats and wines from local sources
- Fluent in English
- Very knowledgeable about his meat and very competitive prices

Perfect place for carne / meat cuts and the guys working here are SO KIND! They helped us select a hot sauce to bring home on our travels as a little keep sake. Amazing wine selection too!  Obrigado !!

Top Quality Meat (Portuguese and International Premium Cuts)
Very good wine selection!
This is the view from my  hotel what an amazing the colorful building along with River and small bridges happy sunny days there

The location is unbeatable, right in the heart of the old town. Very quiet. You have to pick up the keys at another location, but that's not a problem as it's nearby. It has a kitchen, refrigerator, and kitchenware. Access to the building and the apartment is via a code, so you don't have to worry about the key. The extra beds are sofas that pull out (not sofa beds), which are somewhat uncomfortable, and the bed in the main bedroom is a waterbed, which I also didn't find comfortable. The cleanliness was good. It took a little longer than expected to have the apartment ready, but they were very friendly. Good value for money.

The hot tub hasn't been working for over a month, but they don't inform you, fix it, or give you any explanations. They just charge you, and by the time you find out, it's too late. It's a real scam. If you book, make sure what they offer is what you'll actually enjoy.

Perfect, everything is perfect. Everything is new and very nice. Unbeatable location, easy parking nearby, and there's free parking across the river, a 5-minute walk away.
It's best not to book breakfast; you'll have to travel, and there are better, closer places to have breakfast.
Overall, a 10.

I found this place on Google Maps and decided to see for myself if it lived up to the reviews. It did and more!!! From the ambience, to the service, to the quality, taste, and presentation of the food, my brain wanted more, long after my stomach waved the white flag! I'll definitely return!!

The restaurant was ok; the decor was very nice, and the servers were friendly. It‚Äôs a bit expensive for what it is. I had the broccoli burger, which I wouldn‚Äôt recommend, and my friend had bacalhau com natas, which was good in return.
Great burgers, try the Lava! Unexpected atmosphere, nice staff, fair prices. Super recommended üëå

What a pleasant (even a bit hidden) surprise. This place is really amazing. Food was very good and we loved the decoration, which made it more special. Staff was very kind and helpful. They several types of burgers, and some typical meat and fish dishes. Codfish was very well prepared.

First few words about interior design - is fantastic , fancy and feels like u are in Brazil jungles, second is service and of course way of serving dishes - also 10 of 10
And next the main for me is Burger Alheira - is really yammer than others I tried before in different places (not like Mc Donald‚Äôs , I mean real burgers) and to compare it no sense, cause it‚Äôs bomba üëèdue to some kind of ingredients that makes it sweet , exquisite and uniquely delicious. Mucho obrigado for that)üòªüôå

Everything was perfect during my visit. I thoroughly enjoyed the experience ‚Äì from the welcoming atmosphere to the skilled service provided. The staff created a pleasant ambiance, and I was particularly pleased with the reasonable pricing. I am certain that I will be back for another visit. Highly recommended!
Thanks Nuno!
Very well located and much needed

Fantastic restaurant! Starting with the staff, and that's a good start.
We were kindly received, the food was on time and super tasty. My GF asked sushi and I asked chicken burrito. I like Sushi now. :)

The deco is very cute, and even the bathrooms are pleasant :) (check the photos)

There's plenty of parking lots around and the beach it's right around the corner.

We left it up to them to bring us their selection of Sushi for the night. The food was Excellent and I highly recommend letting Pedro bring you his selection.  Can't wait to return and sample more and more.

We chose this place especially for our little "celebration". We were excited! The staff was kind and helpful. Menu selection is simple and sufficient. And that taste! It was a beautiful evening and the food was just amazing! We recommend this restaurant. We will be happy to return again for another tasting!

We visited this place two years ago. Owner of the place was very nice and welcoming, explaining how he is preparing his food, where he is getting his ingredients. That's right! Owner is the best chef around üëç. He prepared our dinner with lot's of care. We had wonderful dinner with great wine, new special food that we never tried before, strawberry üçì sushiüç£ and soup sushi, tuna tartare, tempura shrimp üç§ and great seaweed salad. This restaurant is nr 1 in the aria and I would definitely recommend you this place if you are seafood and sushi lover. üç£üç±ü•Ç

We had a superb, varied and expertly cooked meal with the freshest of ingredients and a wonderful palette of flavours. From the tempura prawns to the vegetable gyozas, to the vegan tacos to the tuna sashimi, everything was stunning. The sashimi in particular is the best I've had ‚Äì incredibly fresh, melt-in-the-mouth tuna. With welcoming, friendly and efficient service and a charming interior with further seating on the decking outside, this place is a gem and well worth every penny of the very reasonable price.
Highly recommended.

The place is amazing and the staff is also amazing!! They were really friendly. The place was full but somehow they got us a table. We ordered Chicken Parmigiana and Pizza Ardente. Is was delicious but I wasn't really impressed haha I don't know why I was expecting something incredible. I think the pasta sauce needed something to make the taste stronger but again, it was still delicious. The chicken was crispy and tasty and the pizza was algo good. BUT what was incredible was the Tiramisu Limoncello ü§åüèªü§åüèªü§åüèª  I'd could eat like five of those. 100/10 . Order it if you go.
The place is cozy and the staff is very friendly. We asked for pizzas, they were really quick and tasty. Will try to come back to enjoy a nice meal in the outdoor space.

We arrive, we sit down, and when they finally come to take our food order they tell us that there are no pizzas or pastas, meaning more than half the menu is unavailable. Telible. What we ordered was good though.

A brunch place that only serves brunch till 11.30am is not only misleading but also pointless. If brunch is intended to exactly combine both breakfast and lunch then what's the point of stating you're a brunch place if you only serve it as late breakfast? Totally misleading.
Very relaxed , great value for money , right by the calm bit of beach ( no massive waves )

Disappointing Experience at Binho

I rarely leave negative reviews, but my experience at Binho was disappointing enough that I feel compelled to share.

I ordered what was one of the more expensive bottles on the menu, expecting a quality pour. Unfortunately, the wine was clearly off ‚Äî either poorly stored or past its prime. I politely brought this to the staff‚Äôs attention, hoping for a reasonable resolution.

What made the situation worse wasn‚Äôt just the wine itself, but how the owner handled it. Rather than addressing the concern with professionalism or even basic courtesy, I was met with defensiveness and a dismissive attitude. There was no genuine attempt to listen or make it right ‚Äî something I‚Äôd expect from any establishment, especially one that positions itself as a WINE BAR.

Everyone makes mistakes, and sometimes bottles do go bad ‚Äî that‚Äôs understandable. But how a business chooses to handle those moments speaks volumes about its values and service standards. Sadly, in this case, the response left a sour taste that went far beyond the wine.

I hope Binho takes this as an opportunity to improve how they handle customer concerns in the future.

Every so often I come here to get a drink and eat small dishes. This is a great place to come with a few friends open a few bottles of wine and spend a greta time chatting and eating really nice food.

Fantastic place
Great service
Great food
Good price
The view outside incredible at sunsetüåû
Thank you
We will be back
Wonderful fresh ingredients if you are really wanting a nice salad this is the place. So good

not enough description on the menu, food was fresh but didn't taste good at all. water was 4‚Ç¨ for less than a litre. staff didn't care to ask how the meal/experience was.  rip off, do not recommend at all.

Our servers were amazing! Our food? Amazing! We just came from Italy and this is close as we have had to traditional Italian pizza. Love it. Go once a week. Our treat. Never been dissapointed.

The cleanliness is magnificent, it has dynamic and friendly employees, the ice creams are very delicious, if you want to try different kinds of ice cream, you should definitely go, the view is very beautiful because it is by the sea. Thank you for everything.

I am reposting a review I submitted in 2017 that was removed today (suggests store is no longer on maps)

I travelled a long way to taste bounty chocolate waffle and ice cream and I wasn‚Äôt disappointed!
The worse waffles i've ever tried, awful staff, really bad experience. If this is how they treat their potential customers I can only imagine what kind of restaurant they are.
The burgers i dont recommend. It comes cold.
Best pancakes I ever had! Good coffee, great food and wonderful service + an ocean view.

We tried gambas (big shrimp), fresh shrimp salad and mexilhao salad ( mussel). And francezinha. All so delicious, fresh, and tasty. I liked sous of mussel, it was cleaned so well, no sand -Best one that I tried yet. Would come back again. Recommended.

We have this bar right next to our house and we always like to come back. Freshly tapped beer, tasty and cheap food + watching sports on the screens is a perfect combination! Attentive and pleasant staff completes a good impression üçîüêô‚öΩÔ∏èü§©

I had the best octopus salad I‚Äôve ever had so went back the next day and had the best veal I‚Äôve ever had üòç! The waiters are super sweet, the decoration is super cozy, it‚Äôs neat, the quantities are big, prices are fair and on the top of that that playlist is well chosen. Well done to the team and thank you üôèüèª

While exploring the coastal area of f Portugal I stopped here for a cappuccino and a bite. The cappuccino was very well prepared and I wished there was more.

As for the bites, I ordered a hard boiled egg and fish cake. Unfortunately they didn‚Äôt have the fish cake so I can‚Äôt comment on that and I‚Äôm not going to comment on a hard boiled egg, lol.

The service was friendly and we managed to communicate via out broken ingles e portugues.

The inside was simple and it looked like it had a full bar. I opted to sit outside as it was a nice day and I had a great view of the lighthouse.

Great place to stop for something to eat at anytime of the day. Seems to be a place where the locals hang out. That means something is right. Stop in for a beer or for lunch. Not a fancy menu but they don‚Äôt need one. Good atmosphere and good service.

Had a fantastic burger tonight with chips (more like what I‚Äôd call crisps) but they were very tasty, the burger was the best I‚Äôve had in such a long time , the staff are so friendly , helpful and super efficient even though the was quite a crowd in this popular place the staff were completely in control attending to all the customers with ease and a smile on thier face . The whole restaurant area was very clean , separate male/female toilets that are very clean and well maintained , there is out door seating , indoor seating and a very nice patio area that I only seen just before leaving , plenty of free street parking . I definitely recommend this restaurant. Thank you guys for a great experience I‚Äôll definitely be back .
Great burgers - tasty, hand made, balanced ingredients. Quick service, friendly staff. May be too busy on peak times, small room.

I had a great experience in this place. Our hamburgers were amazing, for me the Double Ring and the Barbacue Burger for my wife. They were delicious and the people who work there is very nice. 100% recommended.
I can definitely recommend this restaurant. Very gentle staff. Tasty food for a reasonable price.
We had a delicious burger at this restaurant. The onions will also very good. The restaurant was very clean and well kept.
Very good location
A square that becomes a meeting place. The plaques on the homily are illegible after less than a century.
Nice square, with good views.
Small green space with benches around the lighthouse.
Very small park next to the Aveiro lighthouse, but it's good to spend a little time or have a drink on the terrace and let the children play quietly since it's fenced.

The food was exceptional. There were a couple of niggles I had in general but perhaps I'm just old fashioned. Firstly bread for the cover should always be served warm. Never serve beer in glasses with a brand name as this is for coffee shops and and cheap snack houses and finally I still believe that red and white wines should be served in different glasses.
Apart from those observations my wife and I had a lovely evening savouring the 6 course tasting menu. It was a real treat except for the aforementioned observations. Thank you.

We recently visited with the gate one tour. The restaurant had nice decor and the staff were friendly. I wasn‚Äôt very impressed with the food though. We had the vegetarian entry which was beet rice. Our friends had a pescatarian option which was a seafood rice and our travel companions had beef. No one finished their meals. I suspect the quality may be better when they are not cooking for a large group though.

In a tasteful decor. We all enjoy the Chef selection menu and we totally with Michelin who gave him two years in row a ‚≠êÔ∏è.
Service of course was excellent!

Fantastic dinner in a stunningly renovated warehouse. We were greeted with a glass of cava. The staff and sommelier were very attentive and expertly timed each course. The smoked eel and beetroot was phenomenal and the veal was done to perfection. Dessert was out of this world. I would highly recommend! üòä

Nice restaurant but a bit overpriced the full experience. Totally for tourists.
The service is really not good for being the ‚Äúbest restaurant in town‚Äù.
The food was good, and that‚Äôs it. 50 euros per person without alcohol drinks, and sharing starters.

It's the best dancing school! Welcoming environment, with rythm and creativity everywhere!!
Highly recommend!

I wanted to put a minus one star but there is no option for that...we stayed at this hotel last March....actually I could not stay here...it was too nasty...too filthy, it was old, dusty, smelled horrible....I told my husband I would be sleeping in the car...he got us a much nicer room at a lovely little hotel around the corner...this hotel ( Hotel Barra) should be torn down and a new one built...
Very friendly..breakfast was great and view from breakfast area was beautiful
Horrible hotel! Old and Dirty!
Cheap and cheerful
it is at the moment closed
Very good service

Top
Very unpleasant, even from the first phone call. We ran away. Do the same.

I'm very disappointed with my last visit on October 12, 2021, to activate a credit card. Excellent and attentive

The owner sells well.

Great lunch with coworkers! I wanted to try this "Francesinha"long ago, and it turns out to be fantastic! The atmosphere and the waiters were nice and helpful! I ordered the special one and it was very tasty. The fries were great too!
"Francesinha" was the dish we tried, a decent sauce and tender steak,was a pleasant surprise. Restaurante was  clean and calm. Service was attentive and helpful,overall a good experience.

Food is ok, service is horrid, takes forever and they keep forgetting things, the waiters kept forgetting to bring the fries they should have, despite 2 different employees having been reminded to do so, we left without those fries as the meal was over before they came. In the meantime, services for eating out like glovo and uber eats kept picking up their orders without any issues as they were given priority over seating patrons. Room felt cramped, people in smaller groups or without brazillian patrons were neglected and made tired expressions about it.
Just order it online if you're curious, the food was the only nice thing out of the experience and they won't be able to "bring your fries later", so you'll get your damn fries.

My first Francesina, very tasty! Friendly staff.
Recomended!
The food was okeish. I was expecting a lot better. Service was good

Good place to stop for lunch after visiting the Praia de Gafanha. Tasty hamburgers and fries, and the staff made 2 very good improvised vegetarian sandwiches for the ones in our party that didn‚Äôt want to eat meat.

Communicating in English with the waiter was a little hard but, he made it work. Would definitely recommend!
Place with very nice English-speaking staff. Delicious pastries, bifanas and excellent coffee. Very affordable.
One of the best pizzas I have tried in my life (very juicy and tasty), the fries are great too.

I have been living in Portugal for two years and working in the service sector 14 years.
I lived by the ocean for half a year and visited this cafe almost every day.
This should not happen and I leave one star for the terrible service and the raised tone of the woman who apparently is the manager there.
I arrived on an electric scooter, plugged it in and ordered coffee.
There was not a single sign that I could not do this or that this service was paid.
I wanted to charge it a little while I had some coffee.
Moreover, I had already done this in other cafes in the area and no one allowed themselves to behave like that with me.
And what‚Äôs more, I don‚Äôt behave with my clients and they can always charge their phone or scooter when they relax with us.
When I finished my coffee and started reading the newspaper, a waiter boy came up to me and said that I was wasting a lot of their electricity, and this woman immediately ran up and shooed me away in a rude tone and said that I should have asked permission first and that it was expensive.
When I asked how much and where the indicator about the amount weighed, she ran away.
Seriously? A lot of?
An electric scooter will eat as much as a mobile phone in 10 minutes.
I have Portuguese friends and clients and I would not recommend this place to anyone.
It's a shame that such a service is in a place where there are now a lot of tourists and locals.
We tried two other cafes before this and it's definitely the best! Good bread, cakes and coffee. Really busy on a Sunday full of locals.
Fantastic place to eat and wonderful service. I'm here on vacation and it is the place to be! The atmosphere is amazing and the food is even better. I will definitely be coming back.
I visited here on vacation.  The food was excellent and there was a great array of choices.  Service was fast and we were able to get in and out and back to the beach quickly.  Highly recommend!
Would recommended the vegetarian francesinha from here, it‚Äôs amazing. The staff are so lovely too
Food was great and such fun service!

It's horrible. I've been there twice, for pizza, and I had to wait more than 45 minutes, and the fist time the pizza wasn't even in the oven after 30min. They prioritize the pizzas to go, and the oven must be only for 2 pizzas at the time.
Cute spot to try waffle type of treats.
The best ‚Äútripas‚Äù and a fantastic atmosphere with lovely ladies! I highly recommend!
You have to try it, it is must do in this area! Cream one is the best.
What a lovely place, lady is super friendly and everything is delicious ‚ù§Ô∏è
Best in the area great workers good quality . Always go here when I'm in the area .

Nice place, Right next to the canal.
Very friendly service. Price is okay.
Recommended food: shrimps, gizzard, coriander pork feet, clams (all very yummy)
Stuffed cuttlefish is so so.
Not so good: mussels(not so fresh), oysters(not so fresh), sangria red (way too sweet).
Remember to check the bill amount before paying.

Resturant has high reviews & its well deserved
Its located by the canal so nice outdoor seating . The resutrant is small so might need to waite. Staff are very friendly and attentive they try there best to explain the dishes.
They have kids meal ( fish / chicken fingers )
My favoutite is the stuffed octopus risotto
Everyghing tasted yummy and sardines too . My least is the floerless chocolat cake it was very eggy .
They just rebuild from what we saw. Really well done nice place. Food wines and service been great. Price / quality value supreme.

Nice little restaurant.
It is not in Aveiro, but near the beach.
Nothing too special
Do not confuse it with one with high recommendations and it is not exactly gourmet.
Also there are no oysters served here, even though someone posted photos of it.

Great seafood. Very neatly preapared and simple served. Two factors that make this place worth visiting. We‚Äôve tried stuffed squid, oysters, grilled sardines, fried mix - no complaints at all. Prices are right too and service is kind. Highly recommended.

This is a very famous ice cream shop in Portugal. My Portuguese friends took me here. It's a small shop with many flavors to choose from. Ice cream lovers shouldn't miss it. The price is not expensive and the ice cream is rich and flavorful.

Definitely top of the line Gelato, well worth coming over from Aveiro where we were staying.  I‚Äôve tasted Gelato wherever I have a chance in Europe.  Always comparing to my favorite places in Italy and this ranks right up there with the best.  They use local ingredients when possible, make all their own flavors.  I went overboard after the first cone with my standard taste test of chocolate and berry, they hit a home run, as they say.  Then I turned around and tried a cinnamon and basil, was fantastic.  Then the owner brought me freshly made marscapone for a taste test, it was way over the top. The creamiest I‚Äôve ever had!

The best Italian ice cream out of Italy üáÆüáπ
I‚Äôve ever had! Delicious, creamy and full of flavours!
You can see the process of the making from natural ingredients through the window.
Amazing owners and easy going ambience, dogs friendly. TOP üç¶
2 euro for 2 flavors in a bowl of the best ice cream I‚Äôve ever had, spectacular value and quality  , we came every day we were staying in Praia da Barra.

Very nice place, enough space inside the care. Good selection of tastes. Pistachio and salted caramel are top. Avocado taste is very interesting, but not my thing). The prices for the gelato are the lowest I‚Äôve seen in Europe this year

Best banana split ever:
It's 4 scoops that you can choose by your own and only costs 7,5‚Ç¨. The stuff was also very nice! Can totally recommend
Excellent and tasty french crepe(thin and light pancake) with ice cream and egg licorice. Delicious üòã

The best icecream shop in Barra. The icecream is soft, full of flavor and they have a lot of options for us. The attention is great. You have coffee and waffles or crepes for breakfast or an amazing giant icecream for dessert. Open from really early in the morning, till midnight in summer and it's on the way of the beach, less than 2 blocks to touch the sea with your toes.
Wonderful ice-cream. Wonderful humans, XXX thanks so much for returning my mobile XXX

Very nice place to go with friends.
Good ice-cream, creamy, but some of then don't taste like described.
Nice staff.
This place near/front way to the beach.
Have parking lot near.

First time at Gama and loved it! Great food and great space! Had the taco and it was delicious!!! Will definitely go back for a Francesinha :) Would definitely recommend it!!! Marina and Gabriel were wonderful too! Super helpful and knowledgeable! :D

I am really surprised about the beautiful location! You feel very welcome and the food was delicious (i am from Germany, I know a good kebab^^)!
We are excited to come more often in the future, thank you!
I ate Tortilla Wrap.It was so Delicious and Fresh vegetables.Nice place to eat and chill near the beach.Friendly Staff.I highly recommend.
One of the best restaurants I've ever been to, the food is great, the atmosphere is super inviting, and the people running the place are very friendly, simply fantastic!
Really loved this place, nice terrace, good food and the staff was really friendly and nice.

Very nice place to enjoy the beach and the sun. Near from the sand and ocean. Quiet, friendly and clear. The staff are friendly and respectful. Payment suggestions with money, since need minimum 10e to pay with card. On the side you a ice-cream shop from same company. Car parking don't have, since near from beach, you need to search around, some times it's hard to find one.

Food never disappoints. Their clams in garlic sauce are probably the best I've had. Service is great and it's one place you don't have to worry about closing for lunch. Their house wine is great. Their Bream fish amazing. Definitely a place to stop by and enjoy some great food while enjoying the beautiful sea view.

Decent little spot just off the beach. With transparent windbreak so you can see the sunset. Fairly inexpensive for a beach beer, but they said they couldn't take card when we were there. Friendly enough staff.
If want to experience you should go. Food similar to other places around.

BEST PREGO NO PAO EVER!!! And also the clams are very good. This restaurant is nice to sit down and have a nice beer. I really do like the restaurant but for ice cream. It‚Äôs not the best place to go to. They‚Äôre soft ice cream is very good but I can go to another place for cheaper, I understand because it‚Äôs by the water but if you take a walk down to the main road, you‚Äôll find another place with cheaper ice cream, but the food is top-notch. It has a nice buffet inside although I‚Äôve never had it. The food looks very good. The Prego no pao is top notch is the best sandwich I have ever had in this beach, the bread soaked up all the juices and makes it 10 times better than meat is good as well but last time I went I had a nerve which ruined it a little bit but still made it very good That‚Äôs why I gave this five stars.
Had my favourite meal in Portugal here. Was advised to get the robalo and greatly enjoyed it! It overlooks the beach and is a great spot to break for lunch!

It was very tasty squid! Portions are big! But the taste was amazing! Like it a lot! Service is really great, very friendly waiters! Suggest to go there to have tasty lunch or refresh Yourself with wine or beer! :)
Really horrible. Maybe the worst Restaurant I have Ever been to!
Really can't recommend. Better go anywhere else
Choice

The worst experience ever I had to leave the hostel immediately..
The room was not clean and had a strong smell of mold, and the bathroom was also unclean with no soap provided for handwashing.
When I contacted the staff through WhatsApp to request an extra blanket and inquire about the possibility of changing rooms due to the poor hygiene conditions, I was shocked by the response. I was told that because I chose the cheapest room, I should expect a lack of cleanliness, which is an unacceptable way to address customer concerns.Furthermore, I was accused of being a liar when I mentioned the hygiene issues. This level of unprofessionalism and lack of customer service is unacceptable.

It's a low-budget hostel. I think it's perfect for a couple of nights. We staid here 1 night and we were afraid it might be loud. It was surprisingly quiet despite a couple, across the hallway, deciding they want to have a very loud conversation. We could hear them, but I would say the doors did a great job keeping their volume low.
The bathrooms are fine, and while not perfect, they had everything. And I should add there were 3 bathrooms, which is great.
Unfortunately, the kitchen is only a microwave and don't expect to have any space in the fridge (it's tiny). No plates, or forks/knives, But there are a ton of cheap food places in the area.
Lastly, the is no reception. I liked it, since our key was in a secured box, and this meant we could have arrived at any hour, which was good :D

Horrible, just don't come to this place you will save yourself from an unpleasant experience.
The bedroom just stinks and the photos give you an ilusion of how the things really are.
It is a very old house, cold and dirty even the bed isn't properly cleaned and I really doubt that this room had any cleaning at all, not to mention that one of the windows is broken and only one of them opens.
Not worth the value, even for free I wouldn't come to this place again...

2 nights for 225 euros. Total rip off! Right price would have been around 30-40 euros per night. 2.5 times 2.5m room with bunk bed, light, table and a chair. S###. Toilets/showers shared, same with fridge. My recommendation is don't go there. I stayed one night, another night would have been too much.
