Then, the cake we ordered was disappointing: just super sweet, nothing else. Dry and wet at the same time, no cacao flavor in the dough. As for the price (around 3‚Ç¨), it's quality was bad.
As for the paying, it was another struggle, coming from someone who was here for the first time ever, it was confusing to find a line to pay. And on top of that our order wasn't registered correctly. Maybe it was just a bad luck for us.

place_name: CLIP NATAL - Cl√≠nica Pedi√°trica e de Medicina Integrativa de Aveiro
review_text: Very kind and professional pediatrician!
Very kind wait staff, delicious food, and great coffee!
Very friendly staff. Tasty pastry. Bread is excellent!!!
Nice touristic place.
Top

I had a pleasant experience at the barber.
He speaks English, so that was a big plus.
I made an appointment a day ahead.
Beard trim and styling, with a head wash, took 35 minutes.
I recommend!

place_name: O Caixilho - Molduras e quadros por medida
review_text: Very good experience. Ricardo knows what he‚Äôs doing, does it with a smile and does it for a fair price. He has a great variety of frames and some beautiful art. Thank you

place_name: O Caixilho - Molduras e quadros por medida
review_text: It was a very good experience, easy communication, helpful guidance and very quick service. I recommend this place for their services.

place_name: O Caixilho - Molduras e quadros por medida
review_text:
Excellent service at O Caixilho in Aveiro.
Ricardo Pais was very helpful in advising us and his follow-up was impeccable. He was asked to frame a unique triptych photographic artwork by a Chinese artist that was supposed to become a single picture, but it turned out that during the printing process the Chinese artist had made a mistake causing for the three parts not to line up. Ricardo informed me of this mistake and proposed a solution which turned out to be better and more beautiful than the original work by digitally reprinting the artwork on a special paper and using a non-reflecting glass in the frame. Topnotch work.
I strongly recommend O Caixilho for all your framings.
Patrick Van Hautem

place_name: O Caixilho - Molduras e quadros por medida
review_text: Quick and excellent service! I highly recommend.

place_name: O Caixilho - Molduras e quadros por medida
review_text: The owner was very kind and helpful. Wonderful service!

At the top, I recommend

The staff at Barrocas Quiropr√°tica is fabulous.
Dra Maria provides excellent patient care in a warm and friendly manner.
Mariana is tops in physical therapy!
Everyone is friendly and supportive.
They have fixed my back and knee problems quickly and efficiently on several occasions.
I can not recommend them enough.
Obrigadissima amigos!

Very professional staff and services! I immediately noticed even in the waiting room that this place was different.

I didn‚Äôt even know the doctor trained in the US & is also certified in Accupuncture as well. Dr. Sweetmore is an Aveiro treasure for sure! And Sonia gave me one of the best massages of my life! Thank you for making my back and shoulders feel better!

The most arrogant, dismissive staff I have ever encountered. We came in to file a complain and asked for the name of the assistant responsible for the issue that led to the complain and not only did they refuse to give us her name (for a formal complain) but the woman behind the counter (Isabel Bicho) laughed at us. And while this was going on, Leonor hid in her office refusing to take responsibility and claiming she could only speak to us 2 to 3 hours from then and that we were welcome to wait. Absolutely disgraceful.

This traditional francesinha was delicious, and huge!! I would say enough for 2 people, and it comes with the most amazing, crispy fries. The service was attentive, friendly and fast. I did not hear anyone speaking English here, so I think it is a locals‚Äô place, off the beaten path, and authentic. Highly recommended!

The best francesinha we ever had! And it must be true, because my husband is Portuguese.

Thank you!
Great food, excellent and very helpful service. Food arrived quickly and was very tasty. Large portions. We were happy and very full when we left.

First time trying this delicious sandwich. I went for the original and my wife had the tuna. The restaurant has a small menu but a great selection. One sandwich comes with chips and is enough for two!

Food/drinks:
Vegetarian francesinha was good. The sausage and burger were tasty.
The sauce was not the best I‚Äôve tasted in regards to vegetarian francesinhas. However my friends that had the normal one loved their sauce.

The water was filtered from the tap (which they told us beforehand) - but the taste was not nice, in contrary to other tap waters I‚Äôve drank in other places. And they didn‚Äôt have bottled water. 1L was 2‚Ç¨.
My friend asked for a cider that cost 4,6‚Ç¨ so be attentive of the drinks you order

Service:
All the staff was very kind and attentive

Atmosphere: was a busy day so it‚Äôs difficult to make a proper evaluation

Very nice people and excellent products but during the holiday season the waiting lines outside are cold and slow. Be sure of that. They could implement a ticket system or 2 person system. Two for making the boxes, another for the cash. It would be even better.

All and all I keep coming here every time for the ovos moles.
Absolutely great! Service with a smile and we got some to try for free! We bought some to eat immediately and some as gifts, we will return before we leave tomorrow! Definitely a must try!
Pretty place , great location in downtown, near the canal , beautiful street and sure great Ovos Moles üòÅ. Very worth it to go visit and buy some treats !!!
If you want to try typical pastry called Ovos Moles, that's the place!
Delicious Ovos Moles and chocolates to have with an espresso. Bright and clean with souvenirs of Portugal to peruse.

I recommend it to every Food Lover.
The Staff were very nice and kind (brought the children sweets at the end).
We ordered the prawns, mushroom risotto and octopus. Everything was cooked to perfection and tasted heavenly. The restaurant is very nicely decorated and there is quiet music playing in the background. A must if you are in Aveiro.
Excellent fresh and tasty food. Very friendly staff and atmosphere, were more likely you won‚Äôt get for foreigners in Portugal. Must have in Aveiro!

What an awesome meal and wonderful family running this restaurant. Our meals were cooked to perfection and are only regret would be, not being hungrier so we could try deserts. A must visit while in Aveiro.

Codfish - great. Shrimp - minblowing. Red sangria - worth dying for. But the thing to go for is an octopus. Possibly the best I have eaten in my life. Music - ideal. Service - very nice. A jewel in Aveiro‚Äôs crown.
There is new opened restorant with big portions and tasty food! Recommend to try steak and polvo.
Never pick the phone. maybe it's bankrupted

Expensive but boss
Law firm aveiro

Aveiro is stunning! Charming streets with colorful houses!
Canals lined with colorful boats.
The Portuguese Venice.
Worth a visit!
They are useless, do not control their services

A beautiful cozy little linen store with high-quality goods and great design. Medium to high thread count hundred percent cotton sheets that feel like silk. A wide variety of colors of sheets as well as towels, rugs and more. The service could not have been more helpful. Yes they have your size! They have 240 x 240 and in just a day or two will have them custom cut to your mattress size and a fitted sheet made if you desire.
Good quality, good prices!
A nice shop with some stylish shoes. It is quite small but has a friendly boutique feel.

place_name: Pedro Gomes Design is now Possibility .
review_text: Working with Pedro means: Passion, Focus and Professionalism. I think the secret of his success comes from the fact he treats clients like humans. My experience has been always fantastic. When you have people like this in charge of a studio, you can only trust your vision and investment in him. Keep up PEDRO and thanks for all the hard work you and your team have put on my project üëäüèª

place_name: Pedro Gomes Design is now Possibility .
review_text:
Possibility challenges us to go further, with an absolutely detailed design and marketing strategy and thought to detail.

Nothing is left to chance and this is reflected in the sustained evolution of the brands with which they work.

Definitely, guys at Possibility have been positioning their agency/studio in such a way that today it is, in my eyes and of many, the reference for product development, design and strategy.

place_name: Pedro Gomes Design is now Possibility .
review_text: Beyond a regular design studio. Possibility is one of those special places which combines good  value, holistic vision, sustainable outcomes and a system-centric approach to problem solving.

place_name: Pedro Gomes Design is now Possibility .
review_text: A creative, energising team of amazing creatives challenging how product, branding and marketing can play a bigger role in helping businesses and people succeed in a fast-changing future.

place_name: Pedro Gomes Design is now Possibility .
review_text: The only design agency that thinks further than visual design and digs into the core of a customer's problem!
Steep stairs, there is NO elevator, no sights, you open the window to a tiny corridor and can't open it or everybody can see you so there is no light, bathroom not very clean

I WON'T RETURN
When you make your reservation, they tell you there's a private bathroom, and when they send you the codes to access the room, they tell you the bathroom is outside the room.
Incredible that people still use these tricks.
The bathroom is in the hallway, like a 1940s boarding house, with dim lighting and a tiny shower.
It's all pathetic.

Large room with a bathroom, everything very clean and nice.
Comfortable bed and quiet, with air conditioning, you sleep very well.
Next to the center and with free parking available from 8:00 PM to 9:00 AM.
One of the best places we've stayed in Portugal ‚ù£Ô∏è
GOOD BUSINESS! PARKING ON SITE!
The location is great, but parking is only allowed until 7:00 PM on Saturdays and it's closed on Sundays.
Excellent location and very affordable. They were also very kind in helping us get our car out on a holiday. Thank you so much!
Had great service from this travel agent. They went above and beyond to ensure we got our perfect trip.

place_name: P√≥ de Arroz - Health & Beauty by Manuela Pereira
review_text: Great ambiance, good service and it's ran by Manuela which will receive you warmly and make you feel welcome.

I had best experience with Andreia, who was helping me with prolongation of my residency card. Due lots of delays from AIMA side i supposed to submit the documents probably by the end of this year, however with Andrea we have managed to do it in June, and the card was issued on 3rd of October, received 17th. I definitely highly recommend the company and Andreia, personally. High level attention to details, thinking out of the box, planning few steps further in advance, that is what i respected in her work the most.

I'm extremely grateful for Pinho&Cancela. They've helped me through every little step with atmost kindness and tireless dedication. Andreia is an absolute star and I blindly trust her with all my legal needs. They're the absolute best!
Very prestative and helpful
Highly recommended

Super friendly! They were fully booked, yet they still treated someone from outside the company, providing fantastic service and a beautiful, professional hairstyle. And at an excellent price. You couldn't ask for more :-)

As an investor who lives in the United State I am very happy to have crossed paths with Bella Casa. They are very professional and highly talented individuals. They have plenty of connections with architects, contractors, city officials and many other valuable resource to make investing overseas a smooth and stress free process.
Very nice small store, friendly staff.
Local supermarket, had everything I needed and very friendly!
Local commerce :) friendly service
A good shop with Slavic food items, sufficient variety,  a bit overpriced.
Great variety of products, friendly staff!
A good store with our products. Not every city has a place to buy our food. The owner and the salesperson are pleasant. We go there regularly.
This is an excellent shop serving everyone from eastern European origin. Many interesting things for the curious soul as well...
Here you can find almost everything it‚Äôs a wonderful place
Best place to get kielbasa and polish beer in Aveiro
If you are overcome with nostalgia, you can buy or order everything)))

I liked the place; it's very beautiful, clean, elegant, and comfortable. They have decorations that give the place a beautiful touch.

They are very attentive... you can play pool with your friends; in my case, I just went for coffee... Excellent coffee üëç

I'd love to repeat a relaxing day with a game of pool ü§≠

place_name: Pestanas Aveiro | Forma√ß√£o Pestanas Aveiro Rafaela Guarim
review_text: Ms. Rafaela is one of the best lash technicians in Aveiro. She is extremely detailed, and takes her time to create the perfect look for you. She recently did my lashes using the ultra, spiky, wispy, feather style lashes that I have seen used in Asia. This style of lashes creates gaps+spiky clusters to create a wide eye doll affect. Works wonderfuly on my asian hooded eyes :) she is hip and always keeping up with the current trends! Absolutely highly recommend her, you will not be disappointed!
Very clean place...all modern...right in the center of Aveiro...the cake the hostess had for us in the apartment was spectacular...I would definitely come back.
I give faith, pillar, nothing to ask for, everything is perfect.
Everything is perfect...
Great apartament! Great location, very clean and cozy! I reccomend ir!
Everything was excellent, looking forward to returning.

My heart honestly hurts to give a bad review, but this was the first time I experienced such disappointing food in Portugal.
The salmon was raw inside, and the chicken was pink and shiny in the middle ‚Äî clearly undercooked.

The two stars are only for the hardworking lady upstairs who was serving more than 20 customers all by herself. She truly did her best, but the kitchen seriously needs improvement.

UrbanSpot is a nice place for lunch or brunch. The staff is super friendly and always willing to help with whatever you need. The food is good ‚Äî nothing extraordinary, just good. They have plenty of dessert and ice cream options. The daily lunch menu is ‚Ç¨12.90 and includes soup, a main dish, and a drink. They also offer a vegetarian option.

Maybe the best meal I had in Aveiro. This was the simple brunch menu. A croissant with butter and Nutella, eggs with bacon, yogurt with fruit and granola, and a hot cocoa. All of this cost around ‚Ç¨11. We were also told to leave a small tip. I am not sure if that is common practice in Portugal.
Polite staff, although the service was very slow. To be fair, we were a large group, but the result was that half of the dishes arrived first and the rest later, with some being hot and others cold.
Noteworthy is that I was able to enter the place with my guide dog without any negotiation, as required by law. I was glad not to face any problems.
Overall, I recommend it.

Very busy place but the service is quick. Despite they are quick, my wife was joking to be careful if I don‚Äôt want to get the slap in the face (the waitress was that friendly). The coffee was barely 2 but the ice cream was the worst that I tried, pistachio was like a white chocolate and the melon was only sugar water and melon flavour(fully artificial). I don‚Äôt know, maybe in Aveiro they have lower standards. Anyway my opinion is that it‚Äôs not worth.
We went for a brunch. I choose an Egg benedict which was really different from other places. It was excellent
Super shop! We are repeat customers for soft furnishing fabric and I also got a very reasonably priced remnant to make a green screen for video work, also some foam padding for upholstery.
I am told by an extremely reliable, very well educated and highly experienced woman of the cloth this fabric shop is excellent.
Pricy and lack of modern patterns. Same old looking fabrics.

Nice hotel. Remote check in. My room was central and at the back and had solid shutters. So was quiet and dark. The bed was nice too. Main negative was there was no hot water when I went to have a shower. It started at cold and went very cold when someone else in the hotel was obviously having a shower too. But good central location. Easy walk to anywhere in the town.
The rooms was nice and location very central, bed was comfortable. The washroom was a bit small and you have to let the shower run for a while to get hot water. Overall it's great value üëå
Ok for one night. Bedding neet and clean but not very comfortable mattress and pillow(s)
Haven't seen any stuff there. Fully automatic!

Perfect accommodation, air conditioning, high ceilings, clean and spacious rooms, very comfortable beds, free coffee and mineral water, very quiet at night, well-equipped kitchen upstairs, small backyard at the back, comfortable bathroom, but sometimes awkward because there is no door in the bathroom. Stayed here for three nights and got a good rest. There is also a supermarket nearby, close to shopping mall.

2.5 out of 5 or 5/5, as the owner says, it is not a hotel, but an old apartment in desperate need of a stroke of paint and some reforms. It does smell weird and has an abandoned aura about it. The elevator didn't work so I couldn't rest my legs up those 6 floors, I really wanted to rest my legs but whatever. All in all, for the price and short notice I can't complain much. It is a place to sleep in the city center after all, just don't expect a nice place. It is not horrible either, just good enough.
Poorly maintained apartment: faulty lighting, no standard Basic gratuities (tea, coffe, sugar), insufficient towels, modest if not  indecent Kitchen cleaning. What else? Never again...
Hard to find the location (inside the cafe with very small bounce sign)  but easy to use app and luggage was stored safely.
This is a very nice service, tremendously good for when you need to check out but still has a lot to do.
Good and useful app. Unfortunately sometimes shows venues that are open but they are closed.
Says venues are open but they are really never are
All good, helpful staff and central location in Aveiro.  Good caf√© too!
Great selection of products from good brands. Excellent customer service.
Good styles, good quality. A bit expensive.
The seller was very friendly, actively helped me choose clothes, I was left with only pleasant impressions.

We tried to call for a same-day reservation, but they explained that last-minute bookings weren‚Äôt possible and suggested we try our luck by passing by the restaurant, which we did. Fortunately, we managed to get a table, and it was absolutely worth it!
The atmosphere is modern, with a simple yet elegant decoration. The food was excellent. We ordered a starter the O Pastel De Bacalhau. As main we ordered Lombo De Robalo, Tomate e o Manjeric√£o and Bacalhau e a Manga. Both beautifully cooked, full of flavor and presented with care. Portions are generous, and the service throughout the evening was good, however not spectacular. Which is spectacular though is the presentation of the desserts. Both, Laranja e os Sabores Do Bosque and  O Amendoim e o Caramelo are being put to fire for some show effect. Necessary? No. Fun to watch? For sure. Located near the canal area of Aveiro, this place is a must-visit for anyone who appreciates great Portuguese cuisine. Highly recommended, to be repeated!

1 star down for the unpleasant service we received from one of the waiters there who was completely arrogant and unfriendly.
We have visited the place a month ago, just able now to write this review. We came to the place for it had good reviews, but if we had a slight idea about how we will be treated we would have never visited that place. Upon ordering, we asked for the tomato butter that comes as an entry and their special pat√©.
The guy asked any bread? We said no thanks. In a very sarcastic rude way and an arrogant smile on his face he said: so how will you be eating the butter and tomato?
My husband politely told him we thought that it is already served with it. He said: No!
We then asked only for the pat√©, and the 2 main dishes ( 2 different seafood risottos) and white wine. We had the wine at first, and kept waiting for more than 20 minutes for anything to be served. Before those 20 mins, he came by and said that the food is being ready that he can see it almost done. We reminded him that we had asked for the pat√©. He confidently said: I know! And left us.
After a while, still nothing is served. Only the main dished after 25 minutes. We were surprised and asked him about the same thing again, he said I forgot, sorry! I was really tired and the food was already late and he was unbelievable due to his attitude so I quietly said It's ok, while I was already planning to write here what happened instead of making a fuss!
Seriously what kind of service was this!!!
On a fair note, the dishes were incredible and tasty. Seafood was fresh and the risotto was delicious. The only thing that has disappointed us specially that it was one of those first restaurants to visit in Portugal is the service. I recommend the food, the place was clean and quiet, but the service is not what we have expected at all. Such a disappointing experience in a place that should treat people well while dining in.

Absolutely wonderful lunch here today. Food was exceptional. I started with a generous portion of prawns in garlic sauce and the chaps had Bacalhau cod and potato croquettes, all delicious.
My steak with chestnuts was very tasty. My husband and friend had Portuguese style veal, which they really enjoyed and our friend's wife had mustard steak. She also appreciated the house wine.
Service and atmosphere were very nice. This is obviously a popular restaurant, so very glad we had booked. Definitely recommend this restaurant.

While starters were fast to deliver and very tasty, the main dishes took 30min to deliver and were disappointing. Too many contrasting but not suited elements on the plate. Cod was chewy and not that flavorful. Potatoe puree almost tasted like pre-made fome package.

Overall, good, but the experience was not that great.
Friendly staff and good food. A bit farther from the main area of restaurants, which makes it quieter if you eat in the outside.
Interesting on the tour

Very nice and cozy apartment. Located on a very quiet street, quiet, yet centrally located and within walking distance of everything. There's free parking nearby.
The apartment is very clean, and the owners' service is excellent. I recommend it.
Very good service. They waited for us even though we arrived late and couldn't give us any notice.
A wonderful seafood meal experience. Fresh seafood at reasonable price. Comfortable and relaxing atmosphere with great and attentive service. Local gem!

Couldn‚Äôt ask for anything better! I mean from the service itself, always with a smile, and the best part was knowing what was best for us, no matter what we were asking‚Ä¶

The food was great, I mean that was of the best Polvo √† lagareiro that I ever had.

The lavagante was phenomenal just brilliant, well cooked and damn tasty, and the sauce was the final touch that just nailed it.

5/5 totally recommend.

Great food, great service. I advise making a reservation in advance as they have a lot of guests (it's not about skin color as other reviews are suggesting, there are a lot of orders in the lunch time). Food was fresh and well prepared. I'm not used to seafood but I had no stomach issues. Recommended for everyone :)

Amazing experience, thanks for all the people who work there, they all are very polite and professional! We have gone there 2 evenings and ordered Cataplana, Lubina, Bacalhau and more and every dish was really good quality and cooked perfectly, I know this as I worked in kitchen too, so I feel really grateful for such attention to food quality as at is in this place! Highly recommend!
Polite staff, very prompt to serve our table. The food was amazing and authentic for this part of Portugal.
horrible place, the owner is mega rude, it took half an hour to take our order. i asked if he speaks english or french, he says no only portuguese and aks me in english ‚Äúwhat do you want‚Äù -_-
We were welcomed and the food was amazing. Loved all the pastry and rolls.
Really good bakery with affordable prices. I love their brioche croissants, their bread and savoury rolls.
Good coffee, excellent fresh bread, out-of-this-world fresh cornbread! Good pastries and the staff is very nice. Recommended!
What a great Pastelaria!! All is perfect here, including service.
Little store with wine and basic food and home products like light bulbs, flour, drinks, snacks. Very nice owner.
Nice little shop with everything you need. Also sells cigarettes. Open until 10 p.m. and the owner speaks French. A plus for us üòâ

Small, quality store with a wide selection
Smiling and welcoming owner
Limited size selection , but excellent pricing for brand names
Good selection, attentive staff
Good choice and attractive price
Comprei para toda a fam√≠lia igual!!! In love with the store!!!

Excellent food, service is okay once you get a table ... which is near impossible on weekends. Plain little restaurant that punches above its weight on taste and value for the money. Fish and seafood are your best bets. Frango (chicken) is very good but not outstanding.
The food is delicious. Very healthy and refreshing to have dinner there after a long hot day at the beach.
Delicious food and friendly service.
Loved it, probably the best food I had on my trip to Portugal
Good service, big food doses, affordable.

This establishment is one of the worst in Barra.
Well, seeing from the photos, the fries were super greasy, the rice was cold, the salad had the lettuce was with whole leaves.
Tiny little hole in the wall, cheap prices and amazing arepas (I recommend presunto e queijo)
The food was very nice and the Guarana but the pork was a bit chewy but otherwise it was deliciousüòä
Opens early, nice coffee, friendly staff

Top

Very friendly and competent hairdressers washed and cut my wife's and my hair. We were very happy with our visit.

Highly recommended!

They did exactly what I asked, very professionally, despite the late hour‚Äîit was Saturday afternoon.
Excellent work.

place_name: Capela de S√£o Jo√£o Baptista da Praia da Barra
review_text: Such a lovely quaint little church set on the Main Street of this busy town . It has  a large arch/arc entrance door with the cutest bell tower above it to the right side . Inside there are simple but effective wood pews either side of the central aisle . The alter is small but is immediately the focal point when entering the church , walking away from the alter the sun streams in from the coloured glass above the entrance door , above the lighted arc is a wooden balcony accessible via a steep wood ladder/steps . This is a nice relaxing to visit

place_name: Capela de S√£o Jo√£o Baptista da Praia da Barra
review_text:
Our steps led us to this small chapel, and it was quite a surprise.
I wasn't expecting much, since no one was entering or leaving. It looked almost abandoned, and its facade wasn't particularly attractive.
Still, I decided to go in and was pleased with what I saw: a small prayer room with a small altar and an atmosphere of peace and tranquility.

place_name: Capela de S√£o Jo√£o Baptista da Praia da Barra
review_text: Walking to get to the lighthouse we came across this small and pretty chapel, facade with majolica, linear interior, pleasant altar, worth seeing in passing.

place_name: Capela de S√£o Jo√£o Baptista da Praia da Barra
review_text: A chapel we discovered by chance. Very different from what you usually see from the outside, and upon entering, you discover a very old chapel with many images for its size. Given the number of candles and flowers, many devotees must attend.

Aveiro truly surprised us with this hidden gem! The menu offered a fantastic variety of unique and flavorful dishes‚Äîeach one distinct and memorable. We were especially impressed by the warm, attentive staff who made the experience even more enjoyable. Generous portions, great atmosphere, and exceptional service made this a standout meal. A must-visit in Aveiro!

Since I tried this restaurant for the first time I knew that it would be on my top 3 in the region. The staff is incredible and the food is very good. Here you'll find the best Portugal has to offer, hospitality, great food and wine.

Simply the best restaurant we've visited during a trip through Portugal!

Service is excellent and very friendly. One of the waitresses speaks English.

The quality of the food is outstanding

Ratio quality/price = 5 ‚≠êÔ∏è!!!

Do not knave without trying the deserts

Amazing experience in this restaurant with great food to share and awesome customer service with friendly staff !
Food was super fresh (especially the cockles, the bacalhau fritters and the oyster mushrooms) and tasty. A must in Aveiro for sure !!

A bit busy when we arrived and the communication from staff not helpful. But perseverance was warranted, the entree courses, prawns, fish cakes and oyster mushrooms were excellent and prices were right. Would go back there ‚Ä¶ recommendedüëç

Very good meat ü•© and fish plates. The dishes very tasty and 100% home-cooked. The quality was top.
Unfortunately they served the dishes almost cold. After short reheating it was OK again.

Wonderful service fresh delicious food. We picked the freshly caught fish we liked and the cooked it up with potatoes, kale and a side salad. Really delicious and lots of food. We went with our kids and they were very accommodating with our picky eaters.

The restaurant is cozy and the food is OK. We went there for dinner during the week but it is obvious they have staff that are not trained/new and only one Brazilian waiter was giving an outstanding service. The seafood rice was OK and we ordered for 2 people however, the portion it was big. So take that in mind when you order, perhaps for 2 people that are used to eat a lot it might be worth it. We took the leftovers home because it was still rice for 2 people üòÖ I would come back here for the food but something that really annoyed me is that for some reason all the 3 waiters disappeared for long periods at the same time and the desserts took a long long time to be served.

We were there for lunch and we did not regret it. Service are very friendly and helpful. We did spend a lot of time there because the restaurant was full We need to wait a bit for our food but we did enjoy every moment. For the people who are there for some quick food, it is definitely not a place and for the people who wants to enjoy the authentic and affordable local food...this is definitely a must try.
Everything was good there, mostly their dessert. Thank you again for the great food and service.

Best Seafood restaurant we've been to in Praia da Barra and Costa Nova.  Service is amazing. Food absolutely delicious. The cataplana is to die for and their marisqueira just as good. Their stripped bass was so tender and moist. Don't forget the house white wine... spectacular!

The service was terrible, the waiting time was too long, when we needed more drinks no one was available.
For this prizes I think that I can expect a bit of service....
Staff were rude. Food was ok but not great.

Poor experience, undercooked and overall an weird combination.
Never againüòû.

I hate to give bad reviews but on this occasion, I have to.

I‚Äôm reading all these negative reviews and I‚Äôm baffled by it all. We‚Äôve visited this restaurant many times and have for the most part, enjoyed every outing. Most of our visits here are in the off season and perhaps when things are busier, there might be different staff working. The waiter that usually serves us is Antonio. He is a down to earth guy who makes you feel right at home. He‚Äôll talk to you like you were a family member. How typical Portuguese. Nothing wrong with that in my book. After all, remember where you are. Service is quick and commentary by Antonio is always aplenty. Maybe some people don‚Äôt like that. If that‚Äôs the case, there are always restaurants around that charge you double than what they charge here and the waiter will only say ‚Äúyes sir or no sir‚Äù. For what it‚Äôs worth, I would recommend a visit to Corte Real and judge for yourself. I know I‚Äôll be going back.

Mixed feelings about this place. I tried an okay soup of the day and very fresh "mixed fried fish", although it was just one type of fish. Not sure why it was labeled "mixed". It came with a soggy tomato rice that was not good. Kind of pricey for the amount of food. Service was very slow. Beware of the appetizers they bring to your table as you are seated. They are not complimentary. On the contrary, more expensive than a main course. I would stay away from them if you value your money.
Great Tripa - very friendly service. Right next to the beach, so you can enjoy your tripa with a nice view when you walk a few metres. We‚Äòd come back!

We've been visiting Aveiro for over 20 years and trying Tripas, which we consider the best. Grandma used to make them, and we loved them, and her grandson is still making them. We hope to enjoy this Aveiro delicacy for many years to come... Let's continue with the same quality and service as always... Greetings from Spain!

Was looking for a place where we could rent a surf board so my friends had something fun to do and I could chill out a bit. This was the only one open on a Sunday. Boards were very good!! Located in a garagebox, friendly guy. Would recommend!

Great experience, good customer service and good pricesüëçüèªüëçüèª

Thank you very much Rafael und Goncalo!
Very kind and helpnul guy, best price in town good boards.

I had a super cool surfing session and the staff was very helpful picking up the most suitable equipment, and giving great tips about the waves and the wind conditions as well as a good hot shower afterwards:)
It was a really good experience, Rafael gave some really good advices for the surf spot. Thank you for everything
Not the biggest market but that is expected for this area. Great quality and kind stuff!
Typical Portuguese old market, super busy and everything is up for bargaining. Awesome
good place to buy fish
Great freshly caught fish simply prepared. Because it‚Äôs the beach off season I was able to just walk in and get served quickly and with great attention to detail.

Everything was absolutely delicious. I got the Bife Grelhada and the meat was well seasoned and well cooked and the fries were deliciously crunchy not to mention the salad was scrumptious too. I also had this desert, I don‚Äôt remember what it was called but it reminded me of a glorious cheesecake. Either way it was delicious and I enjoyed every bite. I don‚Äôt know what it‚Äôs like during peak lunch and dinner hours however I do recommend going to this place. I found that the food was really good and the service good as well.

We ate here all 3 days we stayed in Gafanha da Nazar√©. Service was amazing and we always relied on the owner to choose the best fish each day. Best fresh fish and service we found in Portugal and as North Americans still on different time schedule, they were always open mid-afternoon! Wine suggestions were good and appreciated as was the amazing molotof! Wish we could stay longer and keep trying different dishes.
The service is amazing she was very friendly and made an amazing recommendation! The fish was very soft and so delicious! Good place to go!
Tasty food good service honest price
Tastes very good. Service could be a bit friendlier
Best tripa in Aveiro, it's also the one with the most extensive line most of the time.
Great tripa with a very wide selection of ingredients
Best tripas in Barra, delicious flavours, great selection of fillings, quick service.

Really good location but it is a run down hotel, smells odd and it is humid, they offer a very basic breakfast. Not quiet as the windows face street and there‚Äôs bars near by and drunken people outside make lots of noise.

We booked this hotel because it was not expensive. We arrived early and were surprised that we were offered a room and could go there as soon as around 9AM. The lady at reception was very nice.
Our room was pretty clean but incredibly cold. There were spare blankets and a heater. We used them, but I still could not warm up after a shower with water slightly higher than body temperature, it never became warmer. If you travel during the winter, you better reconsider this place. Also the walls were very thin and we could hear all the neighbors' conversation.
Breakfast was very basic. The most basic I've ever seen. Tea, coffee and toast were the only warm options.
The location is very close to the touristic area and everything is in a walkable distance.
So the place is okay if you prefer savings to comfort.

My friend and I stayed here for one day and one night, and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay! The rooms, their cleanliness, maintenance, along with the bed linen and towel provided were quite commendable! The most remarkable feature is the location of this hotel, which is hardly 2 mins walk away from the city centre, and has a mini mart right outside. Quite impressively the breakfast was quite delicious, and they had quite many options as well, with breads, different sort of cereals, cheese, sausages and juices and coffee. I am quite satisfied with our stay, and would surely recommend this place to everyone else! Little addition: the owner is extremely sweet and kind!

I was traveling from Lisbon and the train was arriving past 9pm. I call them to let them know and was told they close at 9pm. So no key or code to get in. I had to stay in another hotel I found at the last minute in Lisbon so ended up paying 2 hotels for one night. In all the hotels I stayed in Europe they provided me with a code so I could come in whenever I arrived. I would not recommend staying in a hotel with this kind of limitations.

Very simple but very nice and clean place. Extremely well located. Breakfast is ok, could have a bit more variety. The beds are confortable and there are light blocking blinds so you can have a nice and restful night of sleep. The bathroom is spacious and has good water pressure. There is Wi-Fi and the signal is good. It has no parking but you can find a non payed parking spot close by fairly easily. Basically is a good place to sleep if you're visiting Aveiro for a couple of days.
Nice little supermarket with good fresh products. Low prices as well üëåüèº
Great customer service

Great place to spend the night or even the weekend or week, if thats the planüëçüëç
Really, really central. üëç
The only downside, at my view, is that at the ground floor level, we can hear everything from outside.
But overall I recommend Ria Sal Apartments in Aveiro

Everything was perfect, you couldn't ask for more. The apartment is brand new, fully equipped with a washing machine, dishwasher, oven, microwave... Very clean, super central, yet quiet. The host was very pleasant and attentive. He left us eggs, water, coffee capsules, and more as a welcome gift. It has everything we needed. Highly recommended.

Newly renovated, comfortable, and well-equipped apartment. It's also a great location and Maritza provided excellent service, making communication easy.
We were very comfortable and would definitely stay again. Highly recommended!

Super central and completely renovated apartment. Juvenal is very friendly and explains everything perfectly. Cleaning products, coffee capsules, etc., are provided. Everything is very clean. Washing machine, dishwasher, oven, microwave, toaster, blender... highly recommended
Amazing experience..not too hard or too soft..perfection!  Will be regular here.
Very good massage, strong and relaxing at the same time. Thank you
I got a wonderful 4hands massage! I can really recommend this place.
Second time we've been there and nothing to complain about! Everything is perfect, quick appointment, very pleasant staff for affordable prices. I highly recommend!

An awesome way to stay in Aveiro. The suites are on the one hand located directly in the old town and on the other hand really modern and functional. The WiFi in our apartment was really fast and stable.

Palmeira Soutes is not related to the hotel of the same name across the road. The entrance is equipped with combination locks, which you will receive by email from the booking agent.
The apartment looks great. Definitely value for money. A lovely wide and comfortable bed.

Beautiful apartment, a great place to stay for exploring Aveiro. Spacious, modern, and charming, it has everything you need. The bed is large and very comfortable, and everything is very new and tastefully decorated. Located in the historic center, perfect for exploring Aveiro on foot. The building and accommodations are very quiet and quiet. Highly recommended.
Very good apartment with an excellent location and great service
Amazing experience! Joana was fabulous and the location was perfect. The unit was clean and modern and had all amenities we could need. Beds were comfy. Highly recommend!!
Great accommodation in the heart of Aveiro! Simply the best!
The accommodation is fantastic. Very well equipped and in the heart of the city, with all amenities nearby. Everything is super clean, and the host is charming. We highly recommend it.

Amazing food and the restaurant owner is really friendly and helpful. I loved that all of the portions are tapas, you can taste plenty of the menu options. The rice with beans was out of this world!! ‚ô•Ô∏è The food also came very fast. The french fries are also really good

OMG! I wish there were 500 stars! The place is so so good! The place runs by family. And the owner is so friendly. He and his son explained everything, even gave me to try everything and make decisions what to order. Food serves good. The taste is amazing! I'm in love with this place and food, and people. Please please if you're in Aveiro go there and order everything! You won't be regret. Thank you and good luck!
We were so happy to find this local gem. Small plates of interesting regional food at a great price. Not sure about the fried eels but otherwise lovely! Staff were knowledgeable and charming.

Great little place with really nice and tasty food. All Portuguese classics in smaller formats, ideal for those wanting to try a bit of everything and still leave some space for dessert. Highly recommended!
Very tasty portuguese tapas chosen with helpful advice. Highly recommended!
Excellent apartment, highly recommended

I had  a booking for 3 nights and I was pleased with the service. The staff was kind and helpful, they gave us all the information needed and even more. I went with my electric car and calling them one day before checking in they even reserved me a parking lot  with a plug in order to charge my vehicle. The Overall experience was very pleasant. If I will be again in the area, definitely my first choice. Recommend it 100%

We had a great stay at the Veneza Hotel. At first, we had a room that happened to be next to a rooster that would sing at 4:30 AM. We would have understood if we weren't in a city, but we weren't expecting it. When we told the front desk, they were extremely accomodating and had a cancelation, so they were able to move us the next day. The new room was good, very quiet. The hotel was also extremely clean. The beds were a bit uncomfortable but not worth a 1 star, but for sure a 3 star. The service made up for any inconviences encountered, I would stay here again. Thank you!

The hotel was incredible. The decor was very old-fashioned, but really beautiful and everything was spotless. The room was very clean and lovely, with a view of a small pond with fish, and there was a terrace behind it, probably used for breakfast.

The staff was extremely kind and welcoming ‚Äî they helped us with any information we needed.

The only issue was parking. The hotel‚Äôs parking lot was full, and although there are many spots outside, they were always taken. It was also confusing because in some areas you have to pay and in others you don‚Äôt. Even when we parked in a free zone, we paid just in case, because it wasn‚Äôt clear. But that‚Äôs not the hotel‚Äôs fault.

Other than that, the hotel was amazing, very comfortable, and I highly recommend it.

Parking always fully booked during our 4 days stay. Breakfast at 12.00 euro per person with coffee from low quality machine, same as fruit juices, seem overpriced,specially when across the street there is a very nice bakery/coffee shop which will serve you a breakfast at a fraction of that price. Room was nice with a balcony, but toilet in the room without window nor any type of ventilation (as a knowledge by management) not the best.

An absolutely stunning and wonderful hotel in Aveiro! I had the best sleeps here! Very quiet, lovely and helpful staff. Impeccable cleanliness and delicious breakfast. I will definitely return next year! Obrigada!

place_name: Massage Therapy Aveiro - Namaste Massagem Aveiro
review_text:
Certainly a place where the staff is very much taking care that you get the best experience. They really MEAN it!!

Also they make it happen that you even get an appointment short notice.

I am sure they are experts for full body massage and facial treatment. I did try the feet massage - my expectations were different than the service I received.

They handled the situation very well and professionally and in the end I am happy with the outcome.

The masseurs was a very lovely and friendly lady from Ukraine.

The only thing you should take care of:
I found their board at a house at fish market and scanned the bar code for a whatsapp reservation- but the appointment was scheduled somewhere else. As I had to reschedule for a later time again the place was another.

place_name: Massage Therapy Aveiro - Namaste Massagem Aveiro
review_text: One of the best therapeutic massages I've ever had - toes to scalp.

place_name: Massage Therapy Aveiro - Namaste Massagem Aveiro
review_text: Wow wow wow! There is only one reason I would come back to Aveiro and it is for these magic hands. Heaven! We had a massage with my partner and we loved every sec. Both therapists were incredible and so nice. We travel the world and always have massages everywhere we go and these ones were one of the best. Go go go!

place_name: Massage Therapy Aveiro - Namaste Massagem Aveiro
review_text: We made appointments online the day before and were confirmed almost immediately. They managed to get three of us in. I had a Swedish relaxation massage that was amazing. Highly recommend Daria!

place_name: Massage Therapy Aveiro - Namaste Massagem Aveiro
review_text: Had a couples massage and it was amazing! We messaged about availability and had a booking the same day! There is parking outside but can get busy so just be prepared you might need to find somewhere else to park. We will definitely be going back for more. Thank you!
Good place for breakfast~

I went there for breakfast. They didn't have English menu. I didn't want to have cake. I saw a lady having toast, so I ordered the same and a glass of fresh orange juice.  Later I observed that almost everyone just ordered toast and coffee with milk. None of them ate cake for breakfast. Very affordable price!
Very taste cake and really good coffee :)
We are staying in a near by hotel and came into Art Doce every morning for breakfast. The staff are very friendly and helpful. The food and coffee is outstanding.
Best scrambled eggs and bacon (not burned to a crisp!)  in Aveiro .
Good care, but to charge, they bill for procedures they don't perform, thus underestimating their patients' knowledge.
The cashier did not know any English but was patient and polite with me. They had the food items I came for. They accept credit cards like most other places.
Small, extra local market, among other things, for its butcher's shop. Great service, attentive and really friendly people. I recommend it to you!

We needed to do laundry before boarding the train.  This place was amazing clean.  The attendant could not have been more helpful in several different areas.  It was very efficient and stress-free.
Absolutely recommend!
Very nice and clean laundry.
Very satisfied by this laundry. Cheap price, easy to use and you have a couch where to relax and wait for your laundry. There is a corner for children too.

The place is spacious and clean, and smells lovely. I went early and it was quiet. You put on your clothes, and then the payment machine gives you the temperature information. The machine has instructions in other languages ‚Äã‚Äãand is very easy to use. It has a very comfortable chair for waiting and a children's area. There's also Wi-Fi.
Clean and tidy environment. Excellent value for money. Clothes well cleaned and smelled.

place_name: Friendly Portuguese - Portuguese lessons given by qualified teachers
review_text: I am really grateful for all the Portugese lessons I‚Äôve had from Miguel in the past few years. Online lessons as well as private- and group lessons at the school here in Aveiro. He has been a great teacher and helped me immensely with other aspects of living in Portugal as a foreigner. Thanks a lot!

place_name: Friendly Portuguese - Portuguese lessons given by qualified teachers
review_text: I've been working with Miguel for 3 years and he's brilliant. He's knowledgeable, well organised, helpful. and always prepared to take the lessons where I want to. Highly recommended.

place_name: Friendly Portuguese - Portuguese lessons given by qualified teachers
review_text: Miguel is the best teacher ever, I had variety of techers and classes for learning Portuguese, but I always keep having lessons with him, because he is the best.

place_name: Friendly Portuguese - Portuguese lessons given by qualified teachers
review_text: I have had lessons with Miguel, the founder of the school, for more than a year now. He is professional, and agile enough to tailor his lessons to your specific needs. I‚Äôve enjoyed gaining knowledge for many contexts - professional, personal, cultural, current affairs. Our lessons are varied, and never boring. Plus, Miguel has a great sense of humor, and has the ability to bring life and lightness to the learning process. Thank you, Miguel!

place_name: Friendly Portuguese - Portuguese lessons given by qualified teachers
review_text: I started my lessons in February 2023 with Miguel. I think he's a great tutor. He's very knowledgable on various topics, which ensures our lessons are filled with engaging conversations in Portuguese. He has allowed me to rapidly improve my grammar and confidence in speaking. I highly recommend him and I am excited to continue my Portuguese language journey with him!
5/5 very good place, highly recommend

Servi√ßo humilde mas de excelente qualidade.
Gente s√©ria, extremamente experiente e extremamente profissional.
Recomendo sem qualquer hesita√ß√£o.
---
Humble but excellent service.
Trustworthy, extremely experienced and professional owner.
Fully recommend without any hesitation.

Whenever I need the services offered at Briosa e Gala, I pop in with my examination requisition to make an appointment. I have found the staff warm, empathetic, helpful and friendly. I have always been satisfied with the services they offer that are performed with aplomb by a very professional team. Highly recommended.
Staff is friendly and service is great
Trying to call the number all day long and nobody answers.
Amazing services very educated and intelligent persons
